column2: Dickson Etuhu: Uyu yahoze akinira Nigeriya yagiriwe na ruswa mu mukino muri Swede
column3: Dickson Etuhu, yahoze ari umukinyi nserukiragihugu wa Nigeriya mu mupira w'amaguru, yagiriwe n'icaha co kugerageza kugura umukino muri sentare yunguruza imanza muri Swede. Sentare yunguruza imanza ya Stockholm mu rwandiko yasohoye kuri uno wa gatatu yavuze ko ata gukekeranya Etuhu n'uwundi yahoze ari umukinyi atavuzwe bagerageje guhenda umunyegoli wa AIK, Kyriakos "Kenny" Stamatopoulos. Bashaka kugura umukino wo mu ciciro co hejuru mu mupira w'amaguru muri Swede mu mwaka w'2017. Etuhu yakiniye amakipe menshi yo muri Premier League mu Bwongereza harimwo Manchester City, Sunderland, Preston, Blackburn na Fulham, yasimvye urw'umunyororo ariko acirwa igihano co kutaja mu nkino, ariko nta bindi vyashizwe ahagaragara. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 37, yavuye mw'ikipe ya AIK mu 2016, yavuze ko azokwunguruza kuri iyo ngingo muri sentare ntahinyuzwa. Sentare yavuze ko "ivyo abo bagabo bahaye uwo mukinyi (Stamatopoulos) vyari ibintu utokekeranya ko biri mu rwego rw'ibigize icaha ca ruswa." Etuhu yari yabanje kugirwa umwere na sentare mu mwaka uheze ariko umushinjacaha Johan Lindmark yaciye yunguruza, akaba yabwiye ikinyamakuru Espressen co muri Swede ko ashimye urubanza rw'uno munsi. Lindmark yagize ati "Nakiranye isomwa ry'urubanza rw'uno munsi n'umutima uhimbawe. Nari nunguruje nzi yuko sentare izohindura kandi sinatangaye mbonye ingingo yashitsweko." Etuhu yakiniye ikipe ya Nigeriya, Super Eagles, inshuro 20 mu gikombe ca Afrika mu 2008 no mu 2010 co kimwe no mi gikombe c'isi muri Afrika y'epfo.

column2: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
column3: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

column2: Guardiola ati 'Lionel Messi azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona'
column3: Pep Guardiola arahakana amakuru avuga ko  Lionel Messi ashobora kumuhamyva muri Manchester City, akavuga ko yizeye neza y'uko uyo mukinyi azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona. Imyaka yose y'umwuga wiwe, Messi, ubu afise myaka 32, ayimaze muri Barcelona, ariko mu masezerano afitaniye nayo hakaba harimwo ikigabane kimuha uburenganzira bwo kuja ahandi mu ci riza. Guardiola yaramenyereje Messi i Camp Nou hagati ya 2008 na 2012, aho yatwaye ibikombe bitatu vy'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru  rya Espanye, La Liga, hamwe n'ibikombe bibiri vy'ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, Ligue des Champions. Guardiola ati: "Jewe ndipfuza ko yoguma hariya [muri Barça]". Uyo mumenyereza wa Man City yavuye muri Barcelona asize ayifashije gutsindira ibikombe 14 mu myaka y'inkino ine, aca aja kumenyereza umurwi Bayern Munich wo mu Budagi. Yagiye mu Budagi gutsindira ibikombe bitatu vy'ihiganwa ry' Ubudagi, Bundesliga, mu myaka itatu ikurikirana. Mu Bwongereza, myaka itatu amaze amenyereza Man City amaze gutsidindira Premier League incuro zibiri zikurikirana, 2017/2018 hamwe na 2018/2019, n'aho muri uno mwaka ibintu bitifashe neza kuko Liverpool ifise ikibanza ca mbere muri iryo higanwa iyisumvya amanota 22 mu gihe hasigaye ingiko 13 gusa. Messi, umukinyi amaze gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu incuro zitandatu, ibikombe 10 vya La Liga hamwe n'ibikombe bine vya Ligue des Champions, afise amasezerano azorangira mu 2021 muri Barcelona. Hagati aho, aherutse gushikiriza amajambo atari meza ku wujejwe ukwinonora imitsi muri Barcelona, Eric Abidal, inyuma y'aho uyu Mufaransa yagirije abakinyi ko ata shaka berekanye igihe bamenyerezwa na Ernesto Valverde aherutse kwirukanwa. Mw'ihiganwa rya Espanye, La Liga, Barcelona iza mu kibanza ca kabiri inyuma ya Real Madrid iyisumva amanota atatu. Mu gihe hari abibaza ko Guardiola ashobora kuboneraho akarondera Messi kubera icuka kibi hagati yiwe na Abidal, uyo mumenyereza wa Man City ntaco bimubwiye. Abidal na Messi bompi barabaye abakinyi biwe. Avuga ati: "Jewe sinkunda kuvuga ivyerekeye abakinyi b'iyindi mirwi". "Ndibaza ko azorangiriza umwuga wiwe muri Barcelona". Lionel Messi yashitse muri Barcelona afise imyaka 13, ni ukuvuga mu 2000, aho yatanguriye gukira umupira w'amaguru mu bana batarenza imyaka 14. Yagiye atera imbere mu buryo bw'agatangaza, aho yaduga akaja muri Barça C, hanyuma muri Barça B, gushika mu murwi mukuru, ivyo bikaba vyabaye mu gihe gito cane kitari bwabeho. Mu kw'icenda guheze, uyu mukinyi w'igitangaza aherutse gutsindira agashimwe k'umukinyi wa mbere wa FIFA mu mwaka wa 2019,  ku ncuro ya gatandatu, imbere ya Christiano Ronaldo wa Juventus na Virgil van Dijk wa Liverpool.

column2: Tanzania: Patiri imbere y'ubutungane yagirizwa vya mfura mbi yakoreye abana
column3: Umupatiri wa Ekleziya Katolika mu buraruko bwa Tanzania yarengukishijwe imbere y’ubutungane yagirizwa ivya mfura mbi yakoreye abana, nk’uko bivugwa n’igipolisi. Aba bana ni abanyeshure bo kuva mu mwaka wa gatandatu gushika mu mwaka wa mbere w’ishure ryisumbuye bariko bitegurira gusangira, abandi gukomezwa. Umunyamabanga mukuru w’Inama nkuru y’Abepiskopi muri Tanzania, Patiri Charles Kitima, avuga ko Ekleziya izokorana n’ababijejwe kugira ngo ubutungane bukore muri uru rubanza. Patiri Kitima ati: “Twavuze ko turindiriye iyo ngingo [ya sentare] kugira ngo izindi ngingo zifatwe...ivyemezo ni bitangwe hanyuma nawe ahabwe akaryo ko kwiregura, ico nico turindiriye. “Ni ngombwa ko amategeko akora igikorwa cayo kandi Ekleziya izokwifatanya n’ababijejwe kugira ngo abakorewe ikibi batunganirizwe”. Patiri Kitima yabwiye BBC ko muri rusangi Ekleziya Katorika irwanya ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana kuko isengero ritegerezwa kuba ikibanza c’amahoro kuri bose. Ati: “Reka twemere ko iki ari ikibazo kijanye na kamere ya nyene kubikora, dufise abapatiri barenga 3.000 muri kino gihugu ariko muri bo harimwo abo usanga bafise utunenge n’intege nke, ivyo bibaho”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko iki ari akabi kabishe kuko gituma abavyeyi n’abana bagira impungenge nyinshi, abana iyo bagiye mu bikorwa nk’ivyo baba bizeye ko bagiye guhura n’umuntu yari kubarera muri mutima. Ati: “Rero iyo bakorewe ibitabajanye ni ibintu bibabaza cane. “Twebwe nka Ekleziya turababazwa n’ingeso mbi z’umuntu umw’umwe ziteye kubiri kubiri n’ico twategerezwa kwubaka, kwubaka umuntu mu mico myiza. “Ureste ko iki ari igicumuro kandi kibabaza Imana, gifise n’ingaruka mbi ku bana, rero ni ngombwa ko hafatwa ingingo ruhasha”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko kw’isi abantu nk’abo bahari, ko rero dutegerezwa gufashanya nk’abanya muryango mu guhindura izo ngeso, kandi tugatanga inkuru iyo hari ikintu nk’iki kibaye. Avuga ko uburyo bwo gutanga inkuru muri Ekleziya butomoye, kuva hasi gushika hejuru ku Nama nkuru y’abepiskopi, abantu b’abahinga mu gutorera inyishu ibibazo nk’ivyo.

column2: Amagorwa yo kubaho ufise indwara idasanzwe ituma "ashobora gutabwa nk'akanuka"
column3: Fide Mirón yari afise imyaka 18 igihe atangura kubona ko ariko arahohoterwa n'urunganwe mu gisagara ca Barcelona. Baramwirukanye, bamufata nk'igikinisho, nk'uko we nyene abivuga. Bamuraba nk'agahabwa baravye isura yiwe ingene yari imeze, isura yiwe yahindutse kubera indwara izwi kw'izina rya porphyrie érythropoïétique congénitale. Iyo ni indwara idasanzwe idakunze kwibonekeza ariko mbi cane, yanduye kuva akiri uruhinja. Haciye imyaka 15, Fide yahawe ubutumwa budasanzwe. Bwari buvuye kuri umwe mu bahora bamutyekeza, ariko asaba imbabazi ku nyifato y'ubwana - nk'uko wenyene abivuga ubu - yerekanye kuri we igihe yari mu myaka y'ubuyabaga. Uyu nyene kwigaya yaributse Fide igihe yariko atanga ikiganiro ku banyamakuru aho yavuze ko yarwanije uyu muntu yari fafashwe n'indwara ico gihe yitwa Günther. Ariko rero ntakunda kuvuga "ivyamubayeko muri kahise". Ntaco bikivuze kuri we. Ikimuha ingoga ni uko ubuzima bwiwe bwitaweho cane mbere n'utwigoro tukaba turiko turakorwa kugira ngo haboneke inyishu canke umuti wo gushobora kugabanya ingaruka z'indwara yiwe. Ni indwara mbi cane. Yonona igitigu (umwijima mu Kinyarwanda), igatuma umuntu akama amaraso, akagira ibisebe ku ruhu. Ibihimba vy'umubiri birabora gushika aho bikoroka, arico gituma bayita 'porphyria mutilante'. Mirón ubu afise imyaka 46, uku niko asigura ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Iyi ndwara irababaza cane. Ibisebe vyatanguye kwibonekeza afise amezi atandatu gusa, akiri uruhinja. Abavyeyi banje barantwaye kwa muganga, ariko ico gihe nta bintu vyinshi vyari bizwi kuri ino ndwara. Ico bambwiye conyene ni izina ryayo. Nta muti wari ho - mbere gushika n'ubu ntawubaho - kandi gushika ubu nta wuzi nimba uzoteba uboneka. Ati: "Ikintu conyene cari kizwi ni uko yari indwara ikomeye cane, vyumvikana ko ntari gushobora kubaho mu buzima busanzwe nk'ubw'abandi. "Vyari ngombwa ko ngerageza kwirinda ico cose cotuma nsinzikara, nategerezwa kwirinda kuja ku zuba. "Kubera ko iyi ndwara yanteye gukama amaraso, nakenera guhabwa amaraso buri minsi 15. Mu bwana bwanje bwose namye mpabwa aya maraso. "Iyi ndwara yaza nk'ikiza, uko bukeye uko bwije. Uko navyuka mu gitondo niko nasanga haje igikomere gishasha. Kubera ibikomere naracitse ibikonjo, isura yanje irasibangana. Bwari ububabare budahera, burenze urugero, bubabaza umutima." Ku myaka 14, niho umubiri wiwe wahagarika ivyo kwama aterwa amaraso. Indwara yarahagaze. Ariko ntaho yagiye, ni nk'uko yabaye imuhaye akaruhuko. "Ububabare burabandanya, ariko ntabwo bikomeye nko mu bwana bwanje. Iriyadukiza." Isura yisa "Si nsa n'abandi kubera ingaruka z'iyi ndwara. Ziribonekeza. Ndazi neza ko zishobora kuntuma ntabwa nk'akanuka. "Ariko ibi ntaco bimbwiye. "Umuntu wese yashatse kumenya uwo ndi we aranzi ingene meze n'ico nshoboye. "Umuntu wese yagumanye n'umurwayi Fide yarabonye ko ubu buzima n'ububabare nagize vyampaye inguvu. "Nivyo koko narababaye cane igihe iyo miyabaga i Barcelona bariko barantyekeza. "Umuntu arigira uw'ejo agafata ko ata n'umwe ariko aramuraba. Ku muhingamo w'uyo munsi narabaye igikinisho ciwe. "Ariko ivyo ni ibisanzwe, ni ikintu gito cane c'ubwana, ariko kubona inyuma y'imyaka myinshi yubahutse kunsaba imbabazi biranezereye cane. Nta nyishu Akomeza ati: "Ikintu kibi cane ntabwo ari ububabare umuntu yumva, ni irungu. Ntabwo nshaka kuvuga irungu ry'ukuba uri ukwawe, oya, ahubwo ni irungu ryo kubura inyishu, ukabura n'abakwereka inzira wofata. "Mfise abaganga banshigikira, ariko ntabwo higeze haboneka umuti nyawo. "Ni ibihe biremereye cane rwose kandi bibabaza, iyo wumva ko inzira zose zugaye kandi utagira iyo uja. "Iyo mbajije inyishu, numva umengo ndiko ntera ingorane. Ikibazo canje kiragoye cane kandi kubera ko twese tugenda twihuta, rimwe na rimwe twitaho gusa ibintu twibaza ko dushobora gutorera umuti. "Si benshi bameze nkanje." Yongera ati: "Kuva nkiri muto natanguye kurondera abandi bantu boba bameze nkanje kugira ngo duhimirize ubushakashatsi mu ntumbero yo kurondera umuti. "Hari umwe nashoboye gutora muri Cuba, uwundi muri Brezili, uwundi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. "Ndafise abantu umunani bari muri Espanye. Nka bose bameze neza, ariko mu ci riheze hari umugenzi yapfuye. "Indwara yiwe yahavuye imera nabi. Ntushobora kumenya uko ibintu bizogenda. "Nico gituma ubu nitayeho cane kuyerekana no kurondera inyishu. "Kimwe mu vyo nashoboye gushikako mu bushakashatsi nakoze, ni uko nashoboye guhura na muganga Millet maze dutangura urugendo rwo kurondera umuti. "Iyi nzira iriko iratanga umwimbu kuko mu myaka ibiri iheze hashoboye kuboneka umuti ukora kuri ino ndwara. "Waramaze kwemzwa n'ikigo c'ubuvuzi c'i Burayi (European Medicines Agency) ubu turindiriye ko bawukorera igerageza mu buvuzi kugira ngo turabe ingaruka zawo ku barwayi." Ni inzira itanga umwizero. "Umuryango wanje wambereye ubuzima bwanje. Papa yampaye amaraso nari nkeneye kugira ngo nshobore kubandanya mbaho, ariko maze kugera ku myaka icenda yarapfuye ahitanywe n'isanganya ry'umuduga. Urupfu rwiwe rwaradukozeko twese, ariko cane cane jewe. "Inkingi y'amagara yanje yari isenyutse ni umuntu yampaye amaraso yiwe. "Ubuzima ni amazi. Uno munsi uriho ariko ejo nturiho. Nategerezwa kurwana kugira ngo nshobore kubandanya mbaho. "Ku rundi ruhande, mama yamye anshigikira kandi yikoreye umuzigo munini w'indwara yanje. Ni umuntu akomeye cane kandi ntiyigeze ahengeshanya kunyitaho. "Ubu ntegerezwa kwitaho ubuzima bwanje gusumba, ariko iyo ndonse akanya ndakunda gutembera, nkabonana n'abantu kugira ngo nsangire ivyiyumviro nabo. "Ubu ubuzima bwanje bwarahindutse. Nk'umugore akiri muto, sinashoboye kwiga kubera uburakari bw'iyi ndwara n'imiti yayo ibabaza cane, ariko natanguye igikorwa co kwigisha abantu. "Ikinti ico ari co cose kiba mu buzima gitanga icigwa kanaka. "Numva umengo nshobora kuguruka".

column2: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
column3: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

column2: Nkundabantu : umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yari nde?
column3: Ejo ku wa gatandatu niho umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yaririmbana na mugenziwe Alfred Nyandwi,  yitaba Imana i Bujumbura. Abo baririmvyi babiri bari bagize umurwi abatari bake bari bazi nka "Alfred na Bernard", bakaba bagiye kumenyekana cane ku rukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwiswe NKUNDABANTU. Alfred ati: " Nsigaranye umubabaro udasanzwe kuko yari umugenzi twari tumaranye imyaka n'imyaka, twavuye kure dufatana urugendo rwari rutugejeje aho tugeze, none ansize ndi umwe". Abo baririmvyi bompi basanzwe bava mu miryango y'abacuraranzi ba kera, banaririmvye indirimbo zamenyekanye cane. Bernard Ndoreyicimpa, mwene Mijuriro Mathias  na Ntahonkuriyer Valerie yavutse mu 1986, avukira muri Komine Isare ku mutumba wa Gishingano uhanamiye igisagara ca Bujumbura. Co kimwe na mugenziwe Alfred, Bernard yavukiye mu muryango w'abacuraranzi bahoze mbere baririmba mu murwi w'igihugu wari uzwi nka NAKARANGA. Alfred yabwiye BBC ati: "Uretse ko turi abavyara, twempi tuva mu miryango y'abacuraranzi, kuko papa wanje yakorana na se wa Bernard muri Nakaranga, n'aho bamaze gukukuruka". Se wiwe, Mijuriro Mathias yararirimvye indirimbo abatari bake bibuka nk'izitwa "Abanywa inzoga twaragowe", "Mariya Makurata", "Akarimi", "Musore uri muhira", n'izindi. Alfred Nyandwi yabwiye BBC ko batanguye kuvuza umuziki bari hamwe mu mwaka wa 1998 mu gihe bari bahungiye mu gisagara kubera intambara z'urutavanako zari iwabo mu Gishingano. Avuga ko batanguye kuririmbira mw'ibarabara mu ntumbero yo kurondera ingene bobaho inyuma y'aho ibintu vyabo binyagiwe, n'amazu yabo akabomorwa n'intambara. Ati:  "Ariyo mpamvu twaciye dufata umwuga wo kuririmbira mw'ibarabara, tuvugiriza abantu mw'ibarabara kugira ngo baduhe udufaranga, eka mbere twaranavugiriza n'indya kugira ngo dushobore kubaho". Avuga ko babaye muri ubwo buzima mu kiringo kitari gito, gushika aho buke buke batangura kuza baraja kuvugiriza mu bunywero mu bibanza bikomakomeye vy'i Bujumbura cane cane biri ku nkengera y'ikiyaga Tanganyika, nka za Saga Plage, Petit Bassam n'ahandi. Ati: "Aho hose twavugiriza mu bubare tuvugiriza ingenzi, abantu bari mu karuhuko bakaduha udufaranga duke duke, maze tugashobora kuronka ico dutanga mu miryango yacu kuko twari tukiri abana". "Twatanguye turi nk'abantu bita aba 'mendiants', ba ntahonikora". Alfred avuga ko batanguye kwinjira muri Studio mu 2006, babifashijwemwo na Tanganyika Studio, baca bategura urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwabaye rurangiranwa biciye cane cane mu maradiyo. Urwo rukurikirane rwiswe NKUNDABANTU  rwabatumye bamenyekana cane, runabashikana mu bihugu bitari bike harimwo za DR Congo, Rwanda, Congo Brazzaville, Uganda, Kenya, Cameroun, Benin, Tchad,  Chine na  Brésil. Bernard apfuye be na mugenziwe Alfred bariko bategura gusohora urukurikirane rwabo rwa kabiri bari barahejeje gutunganya, bise BIRATANGAJE, bakaba bategura kurusohora muri uno mwaka wa 2020. Nta wuramenya icamwishe ariko Alfred avuga ko yari amaze ikiringo c'amezi umunani agendana indwara, akaba yapfuye ejo ku wa gatandatu bamutwaye kwa muganga.

column2: Ferdinand Omanyala: Uwambere mu kunyaruka muri Africa yamara agwana n'igitutu ca kahise
column3: Ferdinand Omurwa Omanyala  ashobora kuba ariwe mugabo anyaruka cane muri Afrika inyuma yo guca umuhigo  kuri uwo mugabane ku metero 100 ariko uwo munya-Kenya aremera ko igihano  yafatiwe mu 2017 kubera ugufata imiti itemewe ku bakinyi kigumiza icijiji ku vyo ashikako. Yirutse amasekunda  9,77 mw'ihiganwa rya Kip   Keino Classic ryabaye ku wa gatandatu i  Nairobi  aca avanaho umwanya wari hejuru w'ama sekunda 9.85 wari wagizwe n'umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Akani Simbine mu kwezi kw'indwi. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 25 yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Iyo nirutse nkagira umwanya mwiza cane, abantu baramvuga ariko jewe ndiraba - nta wundi n'umwe nirukira." Umwanya yagize umutuma aba umugabo agira umunani ku rutonde rw'abanyaruka cane kw'isi mu bihe vyose, n'ubwo yarangije ubwa kabiri inyuma y'umunya-Amerika Trayvon Bromell nawe yarushije aho wenyene yari ageze ku masekunda 9,76. Inyuma yo gutangura umwuga wiwe w'ubunonotsi mu 2016, Omanyala  yamaze amezi 14 ari mu bihano inyuma yo gupimwa bigatorwa ko yafashe imiti itemewe, avuga ko wari umuti w'ububabare yafashe. Asigura ko "yagize ivyago vy'ivyashitse. Wari umuti w'ububabare hanyuma bija kugaragara ko warimwo steroid , ivyo nivyo vyatumye mba uwo ndi uyu munsi." "Vyantumye kugira inguvu zo kwivyukiranya, gukomera gusumba - kuko n'ibihe ata munonotsi n'umwe yokwifuza gucamwo - kandi n'icigwa c'uko utofata icarico cose kandi ko utokwizera umuntu n'umwe mu nkino z'ubunonotsi." "Vyarabaye ibihe bigoye cane kuri jewe ariko reka dushire kahise muri kahise. Dutange imbabazi, twibagire hanyuma dukomeze. Jewe ndi umuntu mbaho nkurikije aho ibintu bigeze. Rwabaye urugendo rutoroshe inyuma yo gutangura mu 2016 -imvune, hanyuma gufatirwa ibihano - ariko ivyo biri muri kahise. Ubu turiko turubaka kazoza." Omanyala yemeza ko ashobora kunyaruka kurusha akaba avuga ko yihaye kuzoja munsi y'ama sekunda 9,70 - ikintu kimaze gushikwako gusa na rurangiranwa Usain Bolt wo muri Jamaica, mugenziwe Yohan Blake n'umunya-Amerika Tyson Gay. Uwo yahoze ari umukinyi wa rugby hanyuma agahinduka umwirutsi yumva ko ashobora kwiruka cane kuruta aho mbere akegereza umuhigo w'isi wa Usain Bolt w'amasekunda 9,58. Yavuze atwenga ati : "Ntaho kugarukira hariho". Uwu mwaka wamuziye neza kuko yashitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mu nkino za Olympic ziwe za mbere, hanyuma agaca umuhigo wo muri Kenya ku masekunda 10,00 wanabaye umwe mu myanya itanu yiwe myiza mu mezi indwi aheze. Avuga ati: "Nagumye ntera imbere mw'isiganwa ryose nagize kuko nagize amahiganwa menshi uyu mwaka." "Ivyo nivyo ngiye gukomeza mu mwaka kandi nzotangura hakiri kare nko mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Bisigura ko mu kwezi kwa gatandatu nzoba ngeze ku myanya myiza cane." Yizigiye kuba icitegererezo ku bandi Mu gihugu kizwi cane ku banonotsi biruka ku birere biri hagati na hagati na birebire, Omanyala ubu yifuza guha intege urunganwe rushasha rw'abanya-Kenya biruka ibirere bigufi (sprinters). Avuga ati: "Nsenga nsaba cane ko mu myaka itanu iri mbere twoba dufise ba Omanyala benshi, abana benshi bazi kwiruka, kuko ni je ndi uwa mbere nagwanye kugira nshike kw'isonga." "Ndazi ko hari abantu benshi bashobora kwiruka cane, mu mupira w'amaguru na  rugby, none dushoboye kuronka abirutsi 10, Kenya hari ico yoba ishitseko. "Ubu baremera ko bishoboka kuko abenshi mu babigerageje bacibwa intege n'abavyeyi babo canke abandi bantu bavuga ngo ''nta na hamwe ushobora gushika wiruka ibirere bigufi muri Kenya'. Ariko ubu abantu baremera ko bishoboka. "Ubu nshaka gutanguza umugwi w'abiruka ibirere bigufi hanyuma nshishikarize abakiri bato kwimenyereza turabe aho bazoshika." Umwe mu bemera ko Omanyala, Simbine n'abandi nk'abo nka Enoch Adegoke wo muri Nigeria, yashitse mu gice ca nyuma c'imetero 100 mu nkino za Olympic, bashobora kuba icitegererezo ku banya-Afrika ni uwahoze yitaba inkino za Olympic akagira n'umuhigo w'isi Justin Gatlin. Uwo munya-Amerika, yahejeje inyuma ya Omanyala ku wa gatandatu, avuga ati: "Abanya-Afrika barafise impano zo gushobora kwiruka. "Isi izi abanya-Afrika nk'abashoboye kwiruka ibirere birebire gusa ariko ubu hariho abazi gutera umuhunda  (javelot), abasimba, abiruka ibirere bigufi (sprinters), nibaza ko Afrika ubu yeretse isi ko idafise abashoboye kwiruka ibirere birebire gusa." "Ivyo ni ibintu bikomeye kuba Afrika ifise abo bose. Jewe kuva kera nemera ko Afrika ifise ico iha isi kuruta ivyo imaze gutanga gushika ubu." Abagabo 10 ba mbere banyaruka kw'isi gushika ubu

column2: Denmark: Intwari zashoboye kurokora Christian Eriksen inyuma y'aho agwiriye mu kibuga nijoro
column3: Ikinyamakuru kimwe co muri Denmark/Danemark candika kiti: "Danemark yaraye itsinzwe. Ariko ubuzima bw'umuntu bwaratsinze." Inyuma y'amaganya n'amarira vyaranze ijoro ryakeye, haje ihumure. Ihumure kubera Christian Eriksen - yaguye mu kibuga hasigaye akanya gato ngo igice ca mbere c'urukino rwahuza Danemark na Finlande mu mahiganwa ya euro 2020 - yahavuye ahembuka kandi akaba "ameze neza" aho ariko aravurirwa mu bitaro. Ihumure kandi, kuri bagenzibe bose babangutse kumutabara ku muvuduko udasanzwe. Umuvuduko ushobora kuba ari wo warokoye ubuzima bw'uyu yahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham. Turabire hamwe ingene ibintu vyagenze, n'ingene abakinyi bavyifashemwo mu gufasha Eriksen. Eriksen yaguye mu kibuga igihe yari agiye kwakira umupira wari usubijwe mu kibuga n'amaboko, isanganya ryateye ubwoba budasanzwe mu kibuga Parken Stadium i Copenhagen (umugwa mukuru wa Danemark). Kizigenza wa Denmark Simon Kjaer ari mu ba mbere baciye bamwegera basa n'abamuha akayaga. Ubwo nyene baciye babona ko ibintu ari bibi cane baca bihutira guhamagara abaganga. Amaze kugarura akenge, abakinyi bagenziwe baciye bakora umuzingi kugira bamunyegeze kugira ngo abarorerezi baharurwa mu 15.200 hamwe n'imiriyoni z'abariko bawurabira ku mboneshakure ntibagume babona ivyariko biraba. Benshi muri abo bakinyi - abenshi muri bo baraba hanze - bariko bakorora amosozi. Hari bamwe baboneka ko bariko barasenga. Henry Winter, umukuru w'igisata c'inkino mu kinyamakuru The Times, yabwiye BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Nimba uzi abakinyi ba Danemark, aba si abagenzi gusa bakinana nawe, abantu nka ba Simon Kjaer na Kasper Schmeichel". "Ni incuti pfa mpfe kandi baciye banyaruka gutabara Christian Eriksen. Kubera ubugabo bwabo, baciye baja guhoza umukunzi wa Christian aho yari ari ku ruhande rw'ikibuga ababaye cane". Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 29 ubu akina muri Inter Milan yagiye kuvanwa mu kibuga ari ku nderuzo aca anyarukanwa kwa muganga. Bamaze kuronka inkuru ko Eriksen yari yahembutse, urukino rwarasubiye rurabandanya, Finland ikaba yatsinze 1-0. Umuhinga mu kuvura indwara z'imitima mu gisata co kwinonora imitsi, Sanjay Sharma, akaba ari na we arongoye umurwi w'abahinga mu kuvura indwara z'imitima mw'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru, yabwiye BBC ko "icarokoye ubuzima bwiwe ari uko abaganga bakoze mu bubangutsi budasanzwe". Uwujejwe ubuvuzi mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Danemark, Muganga Martin Boesen, yarafashe ijambo mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru aho yavuze ingene ibintu vyagenze. Ati: "Vyari ibintu bigaragara ko yari yataye ubwenge". "Igihe ndamushikira, yari aryamiye ku ruhande, yari agihema. Narumva ko umutima wari ugitera, ariko ubwo nyene ibintu vyaciye bihinduka duca dutangura kumukorera CPR (impfunyapfunyo ya Cardiopulmonary resuscitation, canke réanimation cardio-pulmonaire [RCR} mu gifaransa, uburyo bwo gupompa ku gikiriza umuntu agize ibibazo vy'umutima uhagaze no kumupepeya kugira bamuhembure). "Ibi vyakozwe mu buryo bwihuse cane, kandi twakoze uko dushoboye kwose turashobora guhembura Christian. Yarashoboye kumvugisha imbere yo kumushikana mu bitaro". Fabrice Muamba nawe yaragize ibibazo vy'umutima wahagaze mu 2012 igihe yariko akina mu murwi Bolton Wanderers. Yarakize, akaba yagiye guhembuka haciye amasaha 72, ariko ntiyigeze asubira gukina. Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Vyangarukaniye ibintu bikiri muri jewe, uwu mubabaro uba uhari.  Ukabirabira kure ariko ntumenye ikigiye gukurikira". "Vyari ibintu biteye ubwoba, ariko ni ugushimira abaganga. Bakoze igikorwa gihambaye cane kuri Christian. Nakunze ingene abakinyi bagenzibe baciye bamwegera baramukingira. Vyibutsa umubabaro mu bisanzwe utifuza kubona. Ndizeye ko ibintu bizogenda neza. Ndizeye ko azokira". Umukinyi wo muri Korea y'Epfo Son Heung-min bigeze kuba bakinana muri Tottenham na we nyene yarungitse ubutumwa bwo gufata mu mugongo mugenziwe, ni inyuma y'aho yari yijije igitsindo cahaye Korea y'Epfo uburenganzira bwo kuzoja gukinira igikombe c'isi yose mu 2022. Ahajeje kwinjiza ico gitsindo kuri penalty, Son yaciye aja kuri camera ati: "Christian Eriksen, ndagukunda". Abakinyi ba Danemark basabwe guhitamwo kimwe muri bibiri - kubandanya urukino muri iryo joro canke bukeye ku mutaga. Bamaze kwumva ko Eriksen ameze neza, bafashe ingingo yo kurangiza urukino. Umumenyereza wa Danemark Kasper Hjulmand avuga ati: "Abakinyi ntibabona ko borara badasinziriye hanyuma ngo buce burire imodoka basubire mu kibuga. Babonye ko vyoba vyiza bavuyeho biheze". "Ni ijoro ritoroshe. Sinoreka gukengurukira ingene aba bantu bamwitayeho neza. Ni umwe mu bagenzi banje pfa mpfe. Ndashima ingene abakinyi bavuganye ko badashobora gufata ingingo y'ugukora ikintu ico ari co cose gushika bumvise ko Christian yahembutse". "Ntushobora gukina umerewe gutyo. Twagerageje kurondera intsinzi. N'aho bitari vyoroshe, abakinyi bemeye barasubira mu kibuga barakina igice ca kabiri". "Mvugishije ukuri, hari abakinyi vyanse rwose. Bababaye cane kandi bacise ivutu. Vyari ibintu biteye ubwoba cane". "Hari bamwe vyankiye ko bashobora gukina, hari n'abandi bariye umutima amenyo barakina. Twaragerageke uko dushoboye, ariko ntushobora gukina neza mu gihe uzi ko mugenzawe yagize ibibazo vy'umutima. Jewe ku bwanje sinumva ko noshobora gukina. Tuzogerageza kubaba hafi, kandi ndizeye ko hari abantu bazodufata mu mugongo". Urukino rusubiriye gutangura, umunyegori Schmeichel yakoze ikosa ridakunze kumubako arinjizwa igitsindo, hanyuma Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg nawe aronka penalty yari gutuma ikigombora, ariko arayihusha. Mu bisanzwe Eriksen asanzwe azwi ko ari umuhinga mu gutera amapenalty, iyo ahaba niwe yari kuyitera. Abarongoye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Danemark bamenyesha ko Christian Eriksen ameze neza aho arwariye mu bitaro kandi ko yarungitse n'ubutumwa bwo kuramutsa abakinyi bagenzibe bakinana mu murwi nserukiragihugu. Itangazo basohoye rivuga riti: "Ameze neza kandi abandanya ari mu bitaro aho ariko akorerwa ibindi bipimo". "Mu gitondo c'uno musi twavuganye na Christian, aca aboneraho no kuramutsa abakinyi bagenzibe". "Abakinyi n'abakozi b'umurwi nserukiragihugu bahawe ubufasha bwo mu bihe bidasanzwe kandi bazobandanya ari yo bari kugira bafashanye inyuma y'isanganya rya nijoro". "Twashaka kubashimira mwese ku butumwa bwo guhoza". N'aho ata tangazo rirasohoka rivuga icatumye Eriksen agwa mu kibuga, umumenyereza wa Danemark Kasper Hjulmand abona ko ari "ikibazo c'umutima".

column2: South Africa yizeye kuronka incanco z'umugera wa coronavirus mu kwezi kuza
column3: Africa y'Epfo yizigiye kuronka incanco za Covid-19 mu kwezi kuza, ariko ivyo biterwa 'uko ibiganiro n'ibigo bizikora bizoba vyagenze neza, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu. Reta ifise ihangiro ryo guha urucanco nibura 67 kw'ijana y'abanyagihugu bose-n'ukuvuga abarenga hafi miliyoni 40.3-gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka kugira haboneke ubudahangarwa kuri iyo ndwara. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu Zweli Mkhize yavuze ko gushika bamaze kuronka incanco zikwiye kugira bakingire 10 kw'ijana vy'abanyagihugu. Yavugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku wa mungu ko gutangura gutanga izo ncanco bitegerezswa ''gukorwa mu buryo bwihuta''. Yanavuze kandi ko reta iriko iravugana n'ibigo vyose bikora izo ncanco hamwe n'ivyemera guzitanga vuba kuruta ibindi. Africa y'Epfo cabaye igihugu ca mbere co muri Africa cashikanye abamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 barenga umuliyoni. Mu minsi iheze muri ico gihugu haratowe ishami ry'uwo mugera rinyaruka kwandukira gusumba, vyibazwa ko arico catumye igitigiri c'abandura ciyongera. Ubu Africa y'Epfo yemeza abantu 1.100.748 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19, abashika 29.577 bamaze gupfa n'abakize 903.679 kuva ico kiza cadutse mu kwezi kwa gagatu guheze.

column2: US: FBI yatesheje umugambi w'iterabwoba wo kwica George W Bush
column3: Umunywanyi wa wa muhari wiyita Reta ya ki-Islam (Etat Islamique/Islamic State) yari yateguye kugandagura uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika George W Bush ariko uwu mugambi ukaba wahinyuwe na FBI, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi ba Amerika. Uwikekwa, akaba aba muri Ohio, yagirizwa ko yarondeye kwinjiza abarwanyi muri Amerika abavanye muri Mexique kugira bakore iki gitero. Ubu arapfunzwe, ejo ku wa kabiri akaba yararengukishijwe muri sentare y'igihugu i Ohio. FBI yakoresheje inderetsi hamwe n'ubuhinga bwo gucungera bwa elektroniki mu gutesha uwu mugambi. Nk'uko vyerekanwa n'inzandiko zo muri sentare, uyu muntu yikekwa - azwi kw'izina rya Shihab Ahmed Shihab w'imyaka 52 - ni umunyagihugu wa Irak abaye muri Amerika kuva mu 2020 akaba yari akirindiriye ubuhungiro yasavye. FBI ivuga ko Shihab yabwiye umwizigirwa wiwe, yigize uwinjiza abantu mu buryo bwa magendo, ko yari mu murwi uzwi nka Al-Raed - ijambo ry'icarabu risigura umuturagaro - ufise icicaro muri Qatar. Mu biganiro yagiranye n'isoko rya FBI,  Shihab avuga ko yashaka kwica George Bush kubera "yishe abanya-Irak benshi" yongera "asambura" Irak. Avuga kandi ko na we nyene yari kuba muri ico gitero "kandi ntiyaraba ko yari gupfa, kuko yari kuba yishimiye kuba mu bakora ico gitero". Shihab avugwa ko yariko arondera ibiranga abapolisi vy'amanyanga kandi ko yariko aratohoza kugira amenye ko abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam bashobora kwinjizwa muri Amerika mu kinyegero baciye ku rubibe rwa Mexique kugira ngo bakore iki gitero, hanyuma bagashobora gusubizwa inyuma mu kubahungisha. Abantu babiri yari yizeye kwinjiza muri Amerika bavugwa ko bahoze bakora mu gisata c'igendereza ca Irak kandi ko bamenyereye ibitero vyo kugandagura. Shihab avugwa kandi ko yavuganye n'irindi soko rya FBI yigize umukiriya mu vyo kwinjiza abantu mu kinyegero. Aba bareretsi bompi bafashe amajwi y'ibiganiro bagiriraniye nawe. Shihab avugwa ko yabwiye aya masoko ko yari yizeye gukoresha aba bantu mu kwinjiza abanywanyi ba Reta ya ki-Islam muri Amerika, n'aho atagirizwa kuba umunywanyi w'uyu muhari w'iterabwoba. Igihe kimwe, Shihab n'umwe muri aya masoko barajanye i  Dallas muri Texas gufata amashusho y'umuhana wa Bush hamwe n'ay'ikigo George W. Bush Institute. Muri Ntwarante (3) 2022, avugwa ko yakoresheje inama  mw'ihoteri y'i Columbus muri Ohio yo kurondera ibirwanisho n'imyambaro y'amanyanga y'abajejwe umutekano. Ashobora gucirirwa umunyororo w'imyaka 10 ku caha co kugerageza kwinjiza umuntu muri Amerika bidaciye mu mategeko, hamwe n'iyindi 20 ku caha co gufasha no gukokeza abashaka kugandagura uwahoze ari umutegetsi wa Amerika. Umuvugizi wa Bush avuga ko uyu yahoze arongoye iki gihugu "yizeye cane amakungu n'igisata ca Amerika kijejwe igendereza, hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano n'ibindi bisata bijejwe igendereza". BBC irarindiriye ico FBI ibivugako.

column2: USA: Inyuma y'impari abakenguzamateka bemeranije ko urubanza rwo kubogoza Trump rwogenda
column3: Inama nkenguzamateka ya Amerika bumvikanye ku kungene urubanza rwo kubogoza Perezida Donald Trump rugiye kubandanya inyuma y'impari zamaze amasaha 13 baterana amajambo. Abagiriza Bwana Trump bo ku ruhande rw'aba Democrates bateranye amajambo n'abamuburanira, mu gihe abo mu mugambwe w'aba Republicains biyamirije ivyasabwa ko hotumwako ibindi vyabona. Urubanza ruza kubandanya uno munsi wa gatatu aho abamwagiriza baza gushikiriza ibirego vyabo, hanyuma abamuburanira nabo bisigure hongere habazwe n'ibibazo. Bwana Trump abaye umu perezida agize gatatu asabiwe kubogozwa mu mateka ya Amerika. Yagirizwa gukoresha ububasha ahabwa n'ubutegetsi mu gukora amakosa hamwe no kuburabuza inama nshingamateka yariko imukorako amatohoza. Arahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Nk'uko bavyumvikanye mu ntahe y'icese ya mbere yabaye ejo ku wa kabiri, ikaba yagiye kurangira uno munsi ku wa gatatu, buri ruhande ruzoronka amasaha ashika 24 kugira ngo begeranye ibirego. Ico gikorwa gitegekanijwe gutangura kuri uyu wa gatatu ku muhingamo. Ivyo biheze, kumbure mu ntango z'indwi iza, abakenguzamateka bazoronswa akaryo ko kubaza ibibazo mu kiringo c'amasaha 16. Inyuma y'aho bazosubira bihweze ikibazo cerekeye gutumako ibindi vyabona. Abo mu mugambwe w'aba Democrates bipfuza kwumviriza abahoze ari abahanuzi mu biro kwa perezida bakoranye hafi cane na Bwana Trump. Aho harimwo umukuru mfatakibanza w'ibiro vya Perezida, Mick Mulvaney, hamwe n'uwahoze ari umuhanuzi muvyo umutekano, John Bolton. Hagati aho, aba Republicains nka bose ntibipfuza ko abo bantu barengutswa. Biciye mu matora aho aba Republicains ari 53 aba Democrates 47, Inama nkenguzamateka yahagaritse integuro zitatu zose z'aba Democrates zari rijanye no kurondera ingene baronka inzandiko hamwe n'ivyemezo vyerekeye urubanza rw'ibogozwa rya Trump. Abakenguzamateka baburijemwo iciyumviro c'umukuru w'abakenguzamateka b'aba Democrates, Chuck Schumer, co gutumako impapuro ziri mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu zerekana ivyo Trump yakoranye n'igihugu ca Ukraine. Bahagaritse kandi umugambi wo gusaba impapuro z'ivyakozwe mu bunyamabanga bwa leta hamwe no mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu bijejwe ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga. Abakenguzamateka b'aba Republicains kandi basubije inyuma umugambi w'aba Democrates wo kurengukisha Bwana Bolton yamenyesheje ko yari kwitaba akamo mu gihe bomutumako. Mw'ijambo ryiwe ry'ukwugurura ibikorwa, Adam Schiff, arongoye umurwi w'abashingamateka b'aba Democrates bagiriza Trump, yavuze ko Abanyamerika nka bose "batizeye ko urubanza ruzogenda neza". Ati: "Ntibizeye ko inama nkenguzamateka itazohengama. Barazi ko ibizova mu rubanza vyamaze gutegurwa". Umurwi w'abanyamategeko baburanira umukuru w'igihugu wari wasavye ko yambikwa izera bidatevye, bakavuga ko urwo rubanza "ruhonyanga ibwirizwashingiro". Mu gihe bariko baraterana amajambo, harageze igihe umucamanza Roberts anegura impande zompi azisaba kwibuka ko bariko babwira "urwego rwa mbere kw'isi rufata ingingo".

column2: Mu kwahukana, Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibirezo vya 200.000$ ku kwezi
column3: Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibihumbi 200 vy’amadorari y’Abanyamerika ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana mu masezerano yo kwahukana. Uyu muraperi rurangiranwa hamwe n’icamamare ku mboneshakure bazosangira kurera abana babo bane. Kardashian yuguruje urubanza rwo kwahukana mu 2021 inyuma y’imyaka umunani abana na West yahavuye ahindura izina akitwa Ye. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho amakompanyi atari make ahagarikiye gukorana na Ye kubera ukutumvikana ku bintu bitari bike harimwo amajambo y’urwanko ku Bayahudi. Mu kwa gatatu batangarijwe ko batakari kumwe , mbere na Kardashian ariyambura izina “West” mu mazina yiwe. Ivyo kugabura amatungo be no kurera abana navyo nyene vyaratorewe umuti muri sentare nk’uko biri mu mpapuro za sentare zashizwe ahabona ku wa kabiri. Impande zompi zizoza ziravugana ku ngingo zikomeye ku vyerekeye imibereho y’abana babo, nk’uko izo mpapuro zibivuga. Amafaranga azokoreshwa ku vyerekeye umutekano n’amashure vy’abana bazoyariha bompi. Vyongeye, Ye yiteze kuriha 200.000$ ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana – kubera, nk’uko ikinyamakuru New York Post kivyandika, abana bazomara igihe kinini kwa Kardashian. Bafitaniye abana bane: North w’imyaka 9, Saint 6, Chicago 4, na Psalm 3. Mu nzandiko zitari nke yasohoye imbere y’aha, Kardashian w’imyaka 42 yavuga ko yipfuza cane ko bahukana, akongerako ko ibi “bizofasha Kanye kwemera” ko uyu mubano warangiye. Imbere y’aha, Ye w’imyaka 45 yararwanije uyu mugambi wo kwahukana. Muri ano mezi ya vuba, yarateje impari, mbere n’amakompanyi atari make aramukurako icizere, harimwo Adidas, Gap, na Balenciaga. Uyu muraperi yaraneguwe bikomeye mu ntango z’uno mwaka inyuma y’aho yitabiriye indwi yahariwe umuderi, Semaine de la mode de Paris, yambaye agapira kanditseko icivugo ngo "White Lives Matter" – amajambo akoreshwa n’abazungu babona ko ari bo basumba abandi (White Supremacy). Mu nyuma yavuze ko abamunegura bahabwa amafaranga n’akarwi k’Abayahudi gakorera mu kinyegero, amajambo asanzwe akorehwa mu kurwanya abayahudi. Mu ntango z’ino ndwi, Ye yatangaje imigambi yiwe yo kwitoreza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2024. Yaheruka kwiyamamaza mu 2020, ariko yaronse amajwi 70.000 gusa.

column2: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
column3: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

column2: Slovenia: Igishusho ca Melania Trump, umugore wa perezida wa USA, caraturiwe
column3: Igishusho c'umugore wa Perezida Trump,  Melania Trump cari gikozwe mu biti bivugwa ko caturiwe aho cari kimanitswe hafi y'aho avuka mu gihugu ca Slovenia mu Bulayi, baca baragikuraho. Brad Downey, umuhinga mu gushushanya yari yakoresheje ico gishusho, avuga ko caturiwe kw'igenekerezo rya 04 z'uku kw'indwi, umunsi Amerika ihimbaza intahe y'ukwikukira. Uyo munyamerika asanzwe aba mu gisagara ca Berlin mu Budagi yaciye asaba ko ico gishusho cari cononekaye gikurwaho ku munsi ukurikira. Igipolisi cabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko amatohoza yatanguye. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika ntivyashatse kugira ico bibivuzeko. Ico gishusho cari cakozwe mu giti gishirwa hanze y'igisagara ca Sevnica aho Melania yavukiye muri Slovenia. Cerekana Melania Trump yambaye ikanzu isa n'ubururu isa n'iyo yari yambaye igihe umugabo wiwe yimikwa catumye, abantu bavuga vyinshi igihe kimanikwa mu kw'indwi 2019. Bamwe mu baba muri ico gisagara bavuze ko ico gishusho kimuteje isoni nk'umugore w'umukuru w'igihugu. Bwana Downey yabwiye Rueters ko icipfuzo ciwe ari ukumenya abasambuye ico gishusho n'ico bashaka. Kubw'iwe, ico gishusho cari gutuma haba ibiganiro ku bijanye n'icuka ca politike kiri muri Amerika, harimwo n'ikibazo nkoramutima c'abimukira. Umugore wiwe yavukiye yongera akurira muri Slovenia igihe iki gihugu cari kikiri intara y'icahoze ari Yougoslavia, mu nyuma akaba yagiye kwimukira muri Amerika mu myaka ya 1990. Ico gishusho muri Slovenia casambuye mu gihe ibishusho vy'abategetsi batandukanye ba Amerika bagize uruhara mu bucakara vyariko birabomorwa bivuye ku myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Mu majambo yiwe aherutse gushikiriza, harimwo n'iryo yavuze ku munsi wo guhimbaza intahe y'ukwikukira, Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yariyamirije bikomeye abonona n'abasambura ivyo bishusho. Kuva Trump atowe nk'umukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2016, Sevnica cabaye igisagara cakira ingenzi nyinshi ahanini zashaka kumenya vyinshi ku mamuko ya Melania Trump n'ubuto bwiwe. Mu kwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze, igishusho cerekana Perezida Trump carubatswe muri Slovenia, mu buseruko bw'umugwa mukuru Ljubljana, naco nyene kikaba catateye impari nk'uko vyagenze ku gishusho c'umugore wiwe. Ico gishusho capima uburebure bw'imetero umunani naco nyene caraturiwe n'abantu batamenyekanye mu kwa mbere kw'uno mwaka.

column2: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
column3: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

column2: Kuki Uburundi buza imbere mu bihugu  bikenye cane kw’isi?
column3: Reta y’Uburundi ikwiye kuva mu majambo ikaja mu bikorwa kugira ngo ishobore kwikura mu kabaregwa ko kwitwa igihugu gikenye kurusha ibindi kw’isi, niko Faustin Ndikumana, umukuru w’ishirahamwe PARCEM, ahanura. Ibanki y’isi yose iheruka gusohora icegeranyo c’umwaka wa 2021 ku butunzi n’imibereho y’abanyagihugu gishira Uburundi mu kibanza c’inyuma, ivyatumye benshi bongera kwihweza kw’iterambere ry’Uburundi. Mu kiganiro na BBC, Ndikumana avuga ko imwe mu ngorane nyamukuru Uburundi bufise ari igiturire, akavuga ko mbere ‘ivyo kukirwanya biriko birasubira inyuma ugereranije n’uko vyari bimeze kera’. Mu gihe umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yiyemeje kurwanya igiturire, Ndikumana abona ko ubutungane kuri we ari inzitizi ikomeye. Ati: “Agerageza gute kukirwanya mu gihe ubutungane butariko burakora. Ugushaka ndavyumva, mugabo ubutungane butariko burakora, ntashobora kuvuga ngo uriko urarwanya igiturire”. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe ryishinze gukangurira Abarundi guhindura ingendo abona ko Uburundi budashobora guterimbere mu gihe hakiri ibihushane iyo hageze gushira mu ngiro imigambi y’iterambere. Iki cegeranyo c’ibanki y’isi yose ku mwimbu rusangi mu gihugu (Produit National Brut, PIB) ku muntu mu 2021, cerekana ko Uburundi buza mu kibanza ca 195 kuri 196 aho Umurundi umwe aronka USD 240 gusa ku mwaka wose. Ndikumana avuga ko bapima ibi bisunze “umwimbu wimburwa mu gihugu kanaka kuko niwo uba werekana ubutunzi igihugu kiba gifise, hanyuma bagaca baraba abanyagihugu ingene bangana, umwimbu cimbura mu bisata bitandukanye ugaca ugabanganywa ku banyagihugu bakibamwo, baca baraba rero ico umunyegihugu umwe umwe wese yoba aronka”. “Ni nk’uko wofata urugo kanaka rurimwo umugore n’umugabo n’abana icenda nk’akarorero, ugaharura ivyo bimbura ku kwezi, amahera baronka ku kwezi, ugaca uyagabura rero na cumi na rimwe, ari ho rero uca ubona amahera umuntu umwe umwe muri urwo rugo ashobora kuronka ku kwezi”. “Urumva n’ingo zirasumbana, hariho ingo zimbura vyinshi. Amahera yinjira ari menshi. Uko muza kuyagabura muri bake, niko ukubaho neza guca kwiyongera. Iyo muyagabura muri benshi nayo ari make, ubukene buca bwiyongera”. Ku ruhande rw’Uburundi, Faustin Ndikumana abona ko Uburundi bwimbura bike ariko bugategerezwa kugaburira abantu benshi, bigatuma bwama buboneka ko bukenye. Uburundi ni igihugu kibeshejweho ahanini n’uburimyi, ibiharuro bikerekana ko 90% ari bo babeshejweho n’isuka. Icegeranyo c’ikigo ISTEEBU kijejwe kwegeranya ibiharuro giherutse gusohora icegeranyo co mu mwaka wa 2019-2020 cerekana ko abarundi 40% bashobora kumara umusi wose badafunguye. Ibi biri uku mu gihe abarongoye igihugu bavuga ko umwimbu ari wose. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka ivyaranguwe n’ubushikiranganji butandukanye mu gice ca kabiri c’umwaka uheze hari mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze nyene ari nawo iki cegeranyo cerekeye,  umushikiranganji wa mbere Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni  yavuze ko muri ico gihe honyene igihugu cari gifise amatoni menshi y’umusesekara ku mwibu w’ibigori. Ndikumana abona ko reta n’abakora ivyegeranyo nk’ibi badahuza kubera reta yoyo ikunda gukoresha imvugo ya poritike. Ati: “Wewe uri mu mabanga, bavuze uko ibintu bimeze birashobora kutakunezera kuko bica vyerekana ko umengo utariko uratunganya ibintu neza. “Imvugo ya poritike sico kimwe n’iy’abahinga, ni naco gituma turiko turasubirira n’inyuma, umunyeporitike wewe yivugira poritike aho kuraba ivyo abahinga bavuga”. Mu gusigura ingorane Uburundi bufise zituma bwama buri inyuma mu butunzi, Faustin Ndikumana afatira ku gitabo ishirahamwe ryiwe riherutse gusohora, aho ryihweza imyaka 60 Uburundi bumaze bwikukiye, n’imyaka ibiri y’ubutegetsi bwa Evariste Ndayishimiye. Muri iki gitabo, yerekana ko imigambi itegurwa ariko ko, iyo hageze kuyishira mu ngiro, “umengo hariko hakorwa ibihushane n’ivyategerezwa kuba biriko birakorwa kugira dushikire intumbero y’iterambere”. Asigura bimwe muri ibi bihushane biri muri iki gitabo, ica mbere ciyongera ku giturire avuga ko “tugomba guterimbere mu gihe tuvuga ko Uburundi bwikwiye kandi ivyegeranyo vyerekana ko ari ubwanyuma k’isi mu bihugu bitunze”. Ati: “Uwuja gukira indwara arayirata, none wewe nimba urwaye indwara, ntiwemere ko uyirwaye, wumva uzoyikira gute? Banza wemere ko ukenye”. Imvo ya kabiri ashikiriza abona ko igihugu kigomba  gutera imbere mu gihe atanzira irashe yo kugiteza imbere ihari ifatiye ku citegererezo c'uko ahandi bigenda. Ati: “Turagenda tukandika ibitabo, ngo plan national de developpement, tukandika, tugakora amanama, ngo dushaka gufata intumbero mugabo izo recommendations tugaca tubika. “Gushika ubu nta kintu na kimwe ca programme-vision usanga reta iriko irakorerako”. Ariko rero, hano ntabona ibintu kumwe na reta ufatiye ku vyo umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yabwiye abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze, ari nawo urabwa n’uru rutonde rw’Ibanki y’isi yose, aho yemeza ko integuro ya reta y’igice ca kabiri yakozwe neza mbere hisunzwe uburyo buvuye hagati mu gihugu, akavuga ko ari na ko vyagenze mu gice ca mbere. Yavuze kandi ko n’ibikorwa bishika 290 vyaranguwe neza hisunzwe integuro ya reta kandi ku rugero rwa 79% ku bushikiranganji bwayiranguye ku rugero ruto, be no kuri 97% ku bushikiranganji bwavyitwayemwo neza gusumba ubundi.  Yemeza ko muri rusangi imigambi reta yari ifise yashizwe mu ngiro ku rugero rwa 88%, mu gihe mu gice ca mbere yaranguwe ku rugero rwa 81%. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yaremeje ko ubutunzi bw’igihugu muri ico gice bwagabanutse kubera ikiza karanda ca Covid-19, mbere ko hari n’ibindi bikorwa vyari bitegekanijwe bitashoboye kuranguka. Imvo ya gatatu atanga, avuga ko Uburundi budashobora gutera imbere mu gihe gutanga akazi hatisungwa ubushobozi n’ubumenyi. Ati: “Wewe uvuga ko ushaka gutera imbere gute udashira imbere incabwenge, abashoboye akazi, ubushakashatsi ngo ubushire imbere, mu nzego nyinshi ugasanga abantu bariko bahabwa amabanga badakurikiza ubushobozi, mu gihe ubu ata n’ibigo vy’ubushakashatsi bihari...none wotera imbere gute”? Ikindi gihushane yerekana, ni uko igihugu kigomba gutera imbere “mu gihe ata buryo buhari bwo kuzana amafaranga mvamakungu mu gihugu kugira afashe mukuzibira ikinogo c’amafaranga Uburundi budafise kandi yongere afashe mw’iboneka ry’amafaranga y’agaciro”. Ati: “Mbega iryo terambere uzorironka gute? Uzokoresha amarundi? N’aho worara urayafyatura, ukayarwiza muri BRB ntaco azokumarira”. PARCEM ibona ko amasoko yashobora gutuma igihugu kironka aya mafaranga asa n’ayadakora neza. Ati: “... raba n’ikawa yasubiye inyuma, icayi casubiye inyuma, igisata c’ubukerarungendo ntitugiteza imbere kugira ngo bazane amadevises, raba n’amafaranga y’agaciro yovuye mu nzahabu n’ubutare urabona ko vyanse ...none ushaka gutera imbere gute?” “Nta barwizatunga bazana imitahe mu gihugu; kwaka ingurane ntibikunda kuko usanga badashobora kwizera inzego, badashobora kuzizera ku buryo boziha ingurane y’amafaranga aboneka”. Ikindi gihushane PARCEM ibona gihagaze kw’ikoreshwa ry’amafaranga ya reta ibona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: “Wewe woza gutera imbere gute mu gihe n’ingene reta ikoresha amafaranga ata muco urimwo, umengo amafaranga akoreshwa mu kanywababo, amafaranga adakurikiza imigambi y’iterambere izwi, amafaranga atwarirwa mu gifuri, za cour des comptes zitayakontorora?”. Mu mwaka uheze wa 2021, Prezida Ndayishimiye yumvikanye anegura bikomeye abo mu nzego zitandukanye n'abamufasha imirimo y'igihugu abagiriza  kuba aribo batuma ibintu bitagenda neza mu gihugu. Ni mu gihe yaheruka “kuririra imbere” y’abacamanza kw'izina ry'abenegihugu, aho yavuga ko batakironka ubutungane bubereye kubera abo bacamanza bamunzwe n'ibiturire. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe rihamagarira abantu guhindura ingendo abona ko umukuru w'igihugu afise utwigoro kandi ko n’amajambo ashikiriza atanga icizere, ariko ko abari musi yiwe batamufasha.

column2: Umwambaro wa ki Islamu w'umudeli, ushira imbere kwikwiza
column3: Aba ba Islamukazi basanga kwambara umudeli mwiza bidasigura kutikwiza. Bafashe umugambi wo guhingura impuzu z'Abaislamukazi z'imideli myiza kandi bakambara bikwije.

column2: China igabisha UK ku gico cayo c'ubwato bw'intambara ivuga ko buriko buravogera ico gihugu ca Asia
column3: Ubushinwa buragabisha umurwi w'amato w'intambara y'Ubwongereza (Carrier Strike Group), aherekejwe n'ubwato bw'intambara  HMS Queen Elizabeth, ko atohirahira ngo akore "ibikorwa bitabereye" mu gihe yinjiye mu nyanja y'Ubushinwa (Mer de Chine méridionale/ South China Sea) isanzwe iri mu mpari. "Igisirikare c'Ubushinwa kirwanira mu mazi, People's Liberation Army Navy kirameze magabo", nk'uko bivugwa na Global Times, ikinyamakuru  co mu Bushinwa cegamiye reta, gisanzwe gifatwa nk'umuvugizi w'umugambwe  Chinese Communist Party (CCP) urongoye ico gihugu. Ubushinwa bubandanya bukurikiranira hagufi aya mato y'intambara Carrier Strike Group, ubu ariko arajabuka inyanja y'Ubushinwa atera aja mu Buyapani, bukagiriza Ubwongereza ko "bucitwara nk'uko bukiri mu gihe c'ubukoloni". Igisirikare c'Ubwongereza kirwanira mu mazi, Royal Navy, kimaze igihe gikora imyimenyerezo kiri kumwe n'igisirikare kirwanira mu mazi ca Singapour, umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe kwivuna abansi akaba adahisha umugambi wo gukorera imyimenyerezo yise "Freedom of Navigation" muri iyi nyanja y'Ubushinwa. Ubushinwa bubandanya buvuga ko iki gice c'inyanja ari igice cabwo, ibiteye kubiri n'ingingo ya sentare mpuzamakungu yo mu 2016, bukaba bubandanya bwubakamwo ibigwa n'amabarabara, bimwe bikubakwa hafi y'uturere tw'inyanja twegukira ibihugu bibanyi. Amato y'intambara ya Amerika n'ayo Ubwongereza aherutse gusotora Ubushinwa kubera ivyo buvuga ko iyi nyanja ibwegukira, mu kuyicamwo n'ibigirankana. Rero ikibazo kihari ni iki: hazohava haba ibisa n'ugukozanyako bisa n'ivyabaye mu Nyanja yirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) mu kwa gatandatu igihe ubwato bw'Ubwongereza HMS Defender bwavyongwa n'indege z'intambara z'Uburusiya igihe bwaca hafi y'ikigwa giteye ibibazo ca Crimée/Crimea? Veerle Nouwens, umwe mu bashakashatsi bakuru mu kigo c'ubushakashatsi mu Bwongereza, Royal United Services Insitute (Rusi), agira ati: "Ubushinwa ntibushaka guhangana mu buryo bweruye n'incuti ikomeye ya Amerika mu nyanja y'Ubushinwa. Ariko uko vyogenda kwose, buzotegerezwa kwerekana imigambi yabwo". Mu gihe Ubwongereza bwokora imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare muri iyo nyanja, umupfasoni Nouwens abona ko dushobora kubona ivyabaye mu 2018 bisubira, igihe ubwato HMS Albion bwaca muri iyo nyanja. Bwarasugerejwe cane n'ubwato bw'intambara bw'Ubushinwa gushika ku metero 200, bubugabisha ko bwohava, mu gihe indege y'intambara y'Ubushinwa yariko igendera hafi cane hejuru y'ubu bwato bw'Ubwongereza. Ubushinwa buriko bukorera imyimenyerezo ikomeye muri ako karere muri ino ndwi, bwimenyereza kurwanira ku mweha, ivyateye ubwoba bamwe mu bihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko buriko bwitegurira gutera Taiwan. Igisirikare c'Ubushinwa kirwanira mu mazi kizofatira kuri ubu bwato bw'intambara bw'Ubwongereza mu mazi y'inyanja y'Ubushinwa "nk'akaryo ko kwimenyereza no kwiga neza ibijanye n'ubu bwato bw'intambara bwa none bw'Ubwongereza ", nk'uko ikinyamakuru Global Times kibivuga. Ariko, n'aho umuzo w'ubu bwato bw'intambara bw'Ubwongereza watumye Pekin/Beijing ishikiriza amajambo y'uburakari, umushakashatsi akorana na Rusi idharth Kaushal, avuga ko iyo bishitse hakaba icuka kibi mu bijanye n'ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu nyanja, "Ubushinwa bwibanda ku bikorwa bisanzwe bidashobora gutuma ibintu biyangara ngo habe ukurasana". Irungikwa ry'ubwato HMS Queen Elizabeth hamwe n'ubundi bubuherekeje mu buseruko bwa Aziya rifatwa nk'igikorwa ca reta y'Ubwongereza co kwongereza uruhara rwabwo mu bijanye n'umutekano kw'isi, nk'uko biri mu nteguro nshasha ya reta y'Ubwongereza mu bijanye na poritike mpuzamakungu, y'umutekano, kwivuna abansi n'iterambere. Ubufaransa, co kimwe n'ibindi bihugu vy'Ubulayi, bimaze imisi bihanze amaso iyi nyanja y'Ubushinwa mu gihe Ubushinwa buriko bwongereza inguvu za gisirikare n'ubutunzi ku muvuduko udashobora guhagarikwa. Ubushinwa buherutse gutangura umugambi wo kwongereza ibisasu vy'ubumara, mu kwubaka ikigo gishasha kizokwubakwamwo ibigega (silos) vy'ibisasu vy'ubumara mu karere ka Xinjiang kari mu misozi. Bumaze kandi igihe bukora misire zinyaruka cane zishobora gusumba umuvuduko w'ijwi kugera ku ncuro umunani , ziwe "ruhonyanganda".

column2: Gasape: Urubuga hwaniro rwa mbere rutangujwe n'Umurundi
column3: Umurundi Saxe Perry Gateka asanzwe arongoye Radio Humuriza FM aheruka gutanguza urubuga hwaniro, rushobora kuba ari rwo rwambere rutangujwe n'umuntu ava muri ico gihugu. Urwo rubuga rukora co kimwe n'izindi zisanzwe zimenyerewe nka Facebook canke Twitter, aho abarwiyandikishako basangira amakuru yanditse, amafoto canke za video, ku buryo bwihariye bagashirako n'amajwi. Aho yavugana na BBC, Saxe Perry yavuze yuko yashatse kugira urubuga hwaniro rukora nk'izindi zihasanzwe mbere ngo rukagira ico ruzirushije. Yagize ati: "... nagerageje kwihweza izindi mbuga dusanzwe dukoresha nka za Facebook n'izindi, mugabo nkabona ko ari ibintu bikomeye cane umuntu atoshikako. WhatsApp igiye kwibandaniriza n'impinduka n'aho uwu mugambi wayo wateye induru Australia yashyizeho itegeko ryo gutuma Google na Facebook biriha amakuru Biden, ikibazo kuri Zuckerberg na Facebook "... naragize ivyigwa vya multimedia mu buhinga bwa kure ngerageje kuri internet, hanyuma ntangura gukora kugira nshobore kwihanga abantu b'abanyamahanga... nagize nti nshaka kwipima ku bihangange vya kure bikomakomeye.." Abajijwe ico urwo rubuga rwiwe rusumvya izindi, Saxe Perry yatanze akarorero avuga ko ku zindi mbuga nka Facebook canke Youtube udashobora gushirako amajwi yonyene, ariko ku rubuga rwiwe Gasape ivyo ngo birashoboka. Ku basanzwe bakoresha  Facebook na Youtube, urashobora gushirako ifoto canke video, ariko amajwi yonyene ukwayo, atari kumwe n'amashusho, ntibikunda. Ku kibazo co kumenya abaza ku rubuga Gasabe abo ari bo n'ico baba barondera, Saxe Perry yavuze   yuko ataramemya neza abaruzako abo aribo. Yagize ati: "...[runo rubuga] rushobora kuba ruriko rurakoreshwa  n'abantu bari hafi ya miriyoni zitatu. Rero sinovuga ngo ni Abarundi gusa, ariko ico nizera ni uko benshi muri bo ari Abarundi. "Ariko usivye ko harimwo n'abanyamahanga kuko turamaze kubona abantu basaba nk'ivyo twita 'ama verification y'ama page yabo', tugasanga abaturungikiye ivyangombwa vyabo ni abazungu, ni abanyamahanga. "Rero novuga yuko muri rusangi ari abantu bari kw'isi yose barukoresha... sinagomvye ko runo rubuga rwitwa urw'Abarundi gusa, ni nayo mpamvu rutiswe Gasape.bi, rwiswe Gasape.com..." Saxe Perry yamye ari umwana akerebutse. Mu mwaka wa 2005, afise imyaka 14 y'amavuko, akoresheje utwuma atoraguye hirya no hino, yarahinguye insamirizi (radio transmitter), ico gihe aca atangura kumenyekana no gushika ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aho niho yahereye ashinga Radio Humuriza FM ubu yumvikana mu ntara zishika icenda zo mu Burundi. Radio Humuriza FM mbere yahavuye ikorana na BBC Gahuzamiryango, icemerewe gukorera mu Burundi, aho yaza iracisha amakuru yayo kuri Humuriza FM. Mu 2017 yatowe muri wa mugambi wa Young African Leaders aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akarisha ubwenge mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ari naho yakuye iciyumviro co gukora urubuga hwaniro. Agarutse yashinze Humuriza TV iboneka iciye ku buhinga bwa Facebook, uno mwaka naho rero akaba yatanguje urubuga hwaniro Gasape, ruboneka kuri internet co kimwe na application ija muri telephone ngendanwa. Saxe Perry avuga yuko ahanini mu bijanye n'uburyo akoresha yimenya, mu majambo yiwe akagira ati "jewe igihe cose namye ndya ikiremve ndacirasheko". Abandanya ati: "Nta muntu novuga ngo ariko aramfasha mu bijanye n'uburyo kuva ntangura runo rubuga kuko iyo mba nari mfise uburyo nari kurukora nko mu ndwi zibiri gusa." Yavuze yuko yamaze imyaka ibiri yegeranya uburyo yaba mu bijanye no kugura ama 'serveurs' canke kugura ibijanye n'umutekano kugira ntihagire abavogera urubuga rwiwe. Avuga kandi yuko mu gihe asanzwe arongoye ibitangazamakuru Humuriza FM na Humuriza TV, hari uburyo buboneka buvuye mu bamenyekanisha  ivyo bakora babicishije kuri ivyo bitangazamakuru.

column2: Zelensky arishimira ‘inkuru nziza’ inyuma yo kwisubiza uturere twari twigaruriwe n’Uburusiya
column3: Perezida Volodymyr Ukraine wa Ukraine avuga ko afise “agakuru keza” ko bigaruriye uturere tutari duke twari mu minwe y’ingabo z‘Uburusiya. Hari ibihuha vyari bimaze imisi bivuga ko bishoboka ko hari intambwe yatewe mu buseruko bwa Kharkiv, ariko abategetsi ba Ukraine bakaba ataco bari bwashikirize. Perezida Zelensky ntiyashatse kudoma urutoke ku turere twigaruriwe, akavuga ati “ubu si igihe co kuvuga amazina” yatwo. Abategetsi ba Amerika bavuga ko Ukraine iriko iratera intambwe bukebuke ariko ikomeye mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ingabo z’Uburusiya. Mw’ijambo ryiwe yashikirije abanya-Ukraine abicishije kuri videwo nijoro,  Zelensky yavuze ko hari “amakuru meza” ku vyerekeye ibihuha bivuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zateye intambwe. Ashimagiza ingabo n’ubutwari bwazo ku rugamba, avuga ati: "Ndibaza ko buri munyagihugu yishimira ingabo zacu”. Ariko, yongerako ati: "Ubu si igihe co kuvuga amazina y’utu turere twasubiye kuduza ibendera rya Ukraine”. Ukraine yarakomeje ibikorwa vyayo vy’umutekano mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, ariko igatanga amakuru make ku vyerekeye ibikorwa vyo kwivuna vyari birindiriwe mu buseruko no mu bumanuko. Ingabo za Ukraine zaratanguje urugamba mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Kharkiv, amaja mu ntara ya Donetsk iri mu buseruko, igenzurwa bikomeye n’igisirikare c’Uburusiya kuva intambara itanguye, haraciye amezi atandatu. Hari amakuru avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zoba ziri hafi y’igisagara ca Izyum, igisagara ngirakamaro mu gushikana ibikoresho ku ngabo z’Uburusiya. Mw’ijambo yashikirije mu birori muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Colin Kahl – icegera c’umunyamabanga ajejwe imigambi yo kwivuna abansi – yavuze ko ingabo za Ukraine ziriko ziravyitwaramwo neza gusumba iz’Uburusiya mu turere tumwe tumwe. Yasubiwemwo n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters  avuga ati: "Haracari kare. Nibaza ko abanya-Ukraine bariko batera intambwe bukebuke ariko ikomeye. Tuzoraba ingene bizogenda. "Ariko ndibaza neza ko ibintu biriko bigenda neza ku ruhande rwa Ukraine muri kino gihe mu bumanuko gusumba uko bimeze ku ruhande rw’Uburusiya”. Hagati aho, ibintu biracameze nabi. Igihe vyariko bitanga amakuru y’ingene ibintu vyifashe mw’ijoro ry’ejo ku wa gatatu, ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare vya Ukraine vyavuze ko igisirikare cabo; “Casubije inyuma ibitero vyose vy’Uburusiya” mu ntara za Kharkiv na Donetsk – ariko ko impande zompi zibandanya ziterana vya muzinga n’ibitero vy’indege, ibibanza bitari bike bikaba bihononekarira. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Perezida Zelensky yavuze kandi ko amafaranga reta ya Ukraine izokoresha mu mwaka uza azoba ari ay’igihugu kiri mu ntambara – aho imiriyaridi 27 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika azoshirwa mu gisata co kwivuna abansi. Ariko yemeye ko ivya nkenerwa mu mibereho y’abanyagihugu, nk’agafashanyo ko mu za bukuru bizobandanya bitangwa. Hagati aho, agabisha ati: "Ni nkenerwa kugabanya mu buryo bwose bushoboka ibintu bidakenewe cane, ibintu vyose bidafasha mu kwivuna umwansi, bidafasha mw’iterambere ry’ubutunzi bw’igihugu cacu, mu mubereho n’akaranga vy’abanyagihugu bacu." Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi muri Amerika no mw’ishirahamwe ONU berekanye amakenga yabo kuri kazoza k’abasivire muri Ukraine mu gihe intambara ibandanya. Umutegetsi mukuru wo mu gisata kijejwe agateka ka muntu mw’ishirahamwe ONU avuga ko iri shirahamwe rifise impungenge ku bantu bata izabo muri Ukraine – cane cane kazoza k’abana. Ilze Brands Kehris, icegera c’umunyamabanga mukuru w’ishami rijejwe agateka ka muntu, avuga ati: "Hari amakuru yo kwizera avuga abana batwarwa ku nguvu batari kumwe n’abavyeyi babo mu karere kigaruriwe n’Abarusiya, canke mu Burusiya bwo nyene”. Ishirahamwe ryiwe rifise amakenga ko Uburusiya bwashinze “uburyo bworoshe” bwo guha abo bana ubwenegihugu bw’Uburusiya, mbere bukabashira mu minwe y’imiryango y’Abarusiya kugira babe ari bo babarera, nk’uko abivuga. Abona ko iyi ngendo ishobora guhonyanga amasezerano ya Geneva. Eka na Amerika ifise amakenga nk’aya nyene, aho ejo ku wa gatatu yavuze ko hari abanya-Ukraine, ariko bakuze, batwarwa ku nguvu. Ibiro vy’ubunyamabanga bujejwe imigenderanire bwagiriza Kremlin ko ifise urutonde rw’abanya-Ukraine bategerezwa gutwarwa ku nguvu mu turere tw’igihugu turi mu minwe y’Uburusiya.

column2: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
column3: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.

column2: Kim Kardashian vyatangajwe ko ata mugabo agira inyuma yo kwahukana na Ye
column3: Kim Kardashian ubu yongeye kuba umugore atagira umugabo inyuma y'imyaka hafi umunani yubakanye na Ye, kare yahora  azwi  ku mazina ya Kanye West. Mu ntahe yabaye ku wa gatatu ku buhinga bwa none (Virtual), uwo rurangiranwa muri reality (ibiganiro vyo kuri television  aho abantu bazwi cane berekanwa bari mu buzima bwa minsi yose canke mu mirimo runaka) yanatangaje icese kandi biciye mu mategeko ko ahevye izina  "West" nka rimwe mu mazina yiwe. Kardashian, yari yarasavye ko yahukana/avana n'uwo mu rapper mu mwaka uheze kugira yongere kuba uwutagira umugabo biciye mu mategeko. Ariko bompi baracafise igikorwa co kugabura ivyo batunze bongere bumvikane uwuzogumana abana. Urwo rubanza rwaciwe ku wagatatu -ruha Kardashian icitwa "bifurcated divorce"- rusigura ko ibijanje no kuvana/kwahukana kwabo bizoba mu bice bibiri: ica  mbere co kwivanako izina rya West no kuba atagifise umugabo mu mategeko catunganye, ikigira kabiri cerekeye uwugumana abana hamwe n'ukugabura ivyo batunze. Mu nyandiko nyinshi yashizeko n'indahiro yashikirije mu kwezi kwa 12, uwo mugore  yatungiye cane mu bikoresho vyo gushariza umubiri no mu biganiro vyo ku mboneshakure yavuze ko yari "yifuje cane" ko ukwubakana kwiwe na Kanye West kurangira. Mu kwezi guheze yari yanditse ati: "Nizeye ko ingingo ya sentare yo kurangiza ukwubakana kwacu izofasha Kanye kwemera ko kuba turi umugore n'umugabo bubakanye birangiye." Ye, w'imyaka 44, atari muri iyo ntahe, yari yagwanije ku mugaragaro ukuvana na Kim aranamusaba ko yogaruka bakabandanya babana. Mu ntahe yo ku wa  gatatu, umushingwamanza wa Ye yararondeye ko Kardashian yokwemera amasezerano y'uko hagize uwundi bubakana Kim atoronka uburenganzira bwo kutamenerwa imbere ya sentare amabanga baba barayaze nk'abubakanye (marital peivilege canke privilège conjugal). Kardashian  n'umushingwamanza wiwe bavuze ko ivyo "ataho vyari bwigere biba" hanyuma bica birarankwa n'umucamanza. Kim na Kanye batanguye kugendana mu 2012 baca basezerana kwubakana  haheze imyaka ibiri. Ye  n'umwe muri ba rurangiranwa mu muziki mu  mudiho wa rap, zimwe mu ndirimbi ziwe zizwi cane akaba ari nka Stronger, Jesus Walks na Gold Digger. Yaranakundiwe kandi n'imideri. Kardashian  yatanguye kumenyekana mu 2007 mu kiganiro ca reality kuri television ku muryango wiwe, Keeping Up with The Kardashians, kuva ico gihe nawe aca aratanguze imideri hamwe n'ibintu bitandukanye vyo kwishariza ku mubiri.

column2: Amahasa yavutse mu nsoro zabitswe mu bukonje imyaka 30
column3: N﻿a  Sam Cabral BBC News Amahasa yavutse mu ntara ya Tennessee yo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuye mu nsoro (urusoro: umwana akiri mu nda) zabitswe mu bukonje mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 iheze. Bifatwa ko ari insoro za mbere zimaze igihe kirekire zikavamwo ikiremwamuntu. Zabitswe mu bukonje bungana na -128C (ni ukuvuga ubushuhe bungana na 128C musi y’ubusa) mu mazi ya nitrogen (azote) ku wa 22 Ndamukiza (4) 1992. Rachel Ridgeway, nyina w’abana bane ava i Oregon, yibarutse aya mahasa ku wa 31 Gitugutu (10) uno mwaka. Se wabo, Philip Ridgeway, avuga ko ari ibisigabwenge. Lydia Ann na Timothy Ronald Ridgeway basa n’uko ari bo baciye umuhigo, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo National Embryo Donation Center (NEDC), ikigo cegamiye idini kivuga ko kimaze gufasha kuvyara impinja zirenga 1.200 zivuye mu nsoro zatanzwe n’abandi. Uwari amaze guca umuhigo afashijwe n’iki kigo NEDC, Molly Gibson, yavutse mu 2020 mu nsoro zabitswe mu bukonje mu kiringo c’imyaka hafi 27. Muganga John David Gordon yabitse izi nsoro avuga ati: "Iyi ngingo…yo kubika izi nsoro yohumuriza abibaza nimba hariho umuntu uwo ari we wese yoba yipfuza kwakira insoro bakoze inyuma y’imyaka 5, 10, 20 iheze”. "Inyishu ikomeye cane ni ego!" Izi nsoro z’amahasa zavuye mu mbuto zatanzwe n’umugabo n’umugore batazwi bari bubakanye, bakaba bategerezwa kuvyara hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa IVF (Fécondation in vitro/In vitro fertilization), ubuhinga bwo kuvyara bukorerwa hanze y’igitereko c’umugore. Umugabo yari mu myaka 50 akaba avugwa ko yahawe irigi n’umugore w’imyaka 34. Izi nsoro zabitswe mu bubiko bwa laboratoire ijejwe irondoka muri Amerika gushika mu 2007, igihe uyu muryango waziha ikigo NEDC muri Knoxville, Tennessee kugira ngo uwundi muryango uzikoreshe. Umuhinga mu bijanye n’insoro kw’ivuriro Southeastern Fertility ry’abubakanye ry’ikigo NEDC yaciye ayeyusha izi nsoro hanyuma azishira mu gitereko muri uno mwaka. Mw’itangazo, NEDC ivuga ko yizeye ko iyi nkuru ishobora “gutera intege abandi kugira ngo baronke aya mahirwe yo kwakira izi nsoro kugira ngo bashobore kuvyara”. Ni we mwana wa mbere umuryango wa Ridgeway - usanzwe ufise abandi bana bane bari hagati y’umwaka umwe n’imyaka umunani – baronse hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa IVF canke ku mbuto zitanzwe n’abagiraneza. Ari muhira mu muryango, Philip Ridgeway yabwiye imboneshakure CNN ati: "Nari mfise imyaka itanu igihe Imana iha ubuzima Lydia na Timothy, kandi yabandanije kuzigama ubwo buzima kuva ico gihe”. "Aha rero twovuga ko ari bo bana bacu bakuru, n’aho ari bo bana bacu bato”. Yongerako ati: "Muri ibi bintu harimwo igisigabwenge”.

column2: Amakuru ku ntambara ya Russia na Ukraine: Uburusiya bugabisha Uburengero ku ngaruka zititezwe
column3: Uburusiya bwagabishije ku mugaragaro Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika - n'ibindi bihugu bicuditse nazo - ku mugambi wavyo wo guha ibirwanisho Ukraine. Iri gabisha ryacishijwe mu rwandiko rw'igisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Moscou, ikopi ikaba yashitse mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru muri Amerika. Uru rwandiko rw'impapuro zibiri - ibiro vy'ubuserukizi vy'Uburusiya i Washington bikaba vyarurungikiye ibiro vy'umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire  - rugabisha ko ingendo ya Amerika na OTAN/NATO yo kurungika ibirwanisho muri Ukraine "isongera isibe" kuri iyi ngwano ya Ukraine, igashobora gutuma haba ivyo abajejwe imigenderanire b'Uburusiya bita "ingaruka zitari zitezwe". Rwarungitswe ku wa kabiri, igihe bitanguye kumenyekana ko Amerika igomba ihe Ukraine iyindi mfashanyo ya gisirikare. Haciye amasaha makeya gusa, Perezida Joe Biden akaba yaciye atera igikumu kw'itegeko ritanga uburenganzira bwo kurungika  imfashanyo ya gisirikare ingana n'imiriyoni 800 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika - harimwo, ubu bukaba ari bwo bwa mbere,  ibirwanisho rutura birasa kure nk'ivyitwa howitzers - ni mu ntumbero yo guha Ukraine inguvu za gisirikare zingana n'iz'Uburusiya muri ico gihugu. Umutegetsi mukuru wo mu butegetsi bwa Amerika yasubiwemwo avuga ko iri gabisha rishobora gufatwa nk'icemezo c'uko Uburusiya bwemera ko imfashanyo ya Amerika na OTAN kuri Ukraine yabaye ngirakamaro. Igice ca mbere c'iyi mfashanyo citezwe gushika muri Ukraine mu misi mike iri imbere, mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya zibandanya kwitegura mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu, imbere y'igitero gikomeye citezwe mu ntara irwanirwa  cane ya Donbas muri Ukraine mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere. Kuva intambara itanguye, Amerika imaze guha Ukraine imfashanyo ya gisirikare ifise agaciro k'imiriyaridi zirenga zitatu z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zishika 3000 zimaze gupfa, abarenga 10.000 nabo bakaba bamaze gukomereka kuva igitero gitangura. Yabivugiye mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure CNN yo muri Amerika, aho avuga ko abari hagati ya 2500 na 3000 bamaze gupfa, ari naho yaciye agabisha ko Uburusiya bushobora gukora igitero ca nikleyeri. Haraciye ukwezi Zelensky avuze ko ingabo za Ukraine zababa 1500 zari zimaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Ariko, aho hose yama avuga ko Abarusiya basumba kure ivyo bitigiri vy'abamaze gupfa. BBC ubwayo ntirashobora guhinyuza ibi bitigiri bitarimwo abasivire. Impande zompi zama zitangaza ibitigiri vyo ku rundi ruhande vy'abo zimaze kwica - akenshi bikaba ari ivy'umurengera bisumba kure cane ibitangazwa n'urudi ruhande. Isi yoba iritegurira ko Uburusiya bushobora kuzotera Ukraine bukoresheje ikirwanisho ca nikleyeri, nk'uko vyaraye bivuzwe na Perezida Zelensky. Zelensky yari abajijwe na CNN  nimba yari afise ubwoba ku biherutse kuvugwa n'umukuru wa CIA, aho ku wa kane yavuze ko Uburusiya bushobora guhindura amayeri bugakoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri. "Si jewe gusa - ni isi yose, ibihugu vyose bitegerezwa kuba maso kuko ishobora kuba atari inkuru yo, ariko ishobora kuba ari ukuri", niko Zelensky avuga, mu majambo make y'icongereza yakoresheje kugira ngo ashimangire. Abandanya ati: "Ni ngombwa ko twiyumvira aho gutinya, ntidutinye ahubwo twitegure. Ariko ico si ikibazo ca Ukraine - si Ukraine gusa - ariko ni ikibazo c'isi yose, niko nibaza". Mu kwezi guheze, umuvugizi wa Kremlin yavuze ko Uburusiya bushobora kwikora ku birwanisho vya nikleyeri gusa mu gihe vyoboneka ko ukubaho kwabwo kubangamiwe. Zelensky kandi yabajijwe ku bwato rutura bw'intambara bw'Uburusiya bwazamye, buzwi nka Moskva, ariko yariyubaye ku makuru avuga ko ubu bwato bwatewe misire zibiri za ukrane. "Ico tuzi ni uko butakibaho. Kuri twebwe, ni ikirwanisho gikomeye cane kibangamiye igihugu cacu, rero izama ryabwo ntabwo ritubabaje. "Mu gihe Uburusiya bwokehanirwa n'ibirwanisho bukoresha mu kudutera, yoba ari amahirwe kuri twebwe". Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije mu masaha yitereye y'ijoro ryakeye, avuga ko bigoye kumenya igihe iyi ntambara izomara. Ati: " Nivyo, ndumva kandi ibitandukanye bivugwa. Mfise amakuru menshi gusumba ibinyamakuru bimwe bimwe ku bijanye n'intumbero n'ubushobozi igisirikare c'Uburusiya gifise. "Ku bijanye na kazoza k'ubutunzi bw'Uburusiya. Kubijanye n'ingene abanyagihugu biyumva mu Burusiya". Avuga ko hari ibintu bibiri bizokwerekana igihe intambara izomara. Avuga ati: "Ingene abasirikare bacu bazovyifatamwo neza ni ikintu gikomeye. "Ni ikintu nyamukuru mu mateka yacu. Ariko ntigikwiye kugira ngo twomore abigaruriye ubutaka bwacu. Ariko tuzobakubita". "Ibihano ku Burusiya ni ikintu gikomeye cane. Bihungabanya ubutunzi. Ariko ntigikwiye kugira ngo igisirikare c'Uburusiya kibure ibikibeshaho. Dukeneye ibirwanisho bikomeye, bishobora kubasambura". Yongerako ati: "Umuntu avuze ati: umwaka canke myaka, nishura nti: intambara urashobora kuyigira nto gusumba. Ni twaronka hakiri kare ibirwanisho binini twasavye, niho tuzogira inguvu kandi niho tuzoshobora kugarukana amahoro vuba". Umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine wazindutse uterwa amabombe nk'uko bivugwa n'umukuru w'igisagara. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri Instagram, Vitali Klitschko yavuze ko aya mabombe yatewe mu karere ka Darnytskyi kari ku nkengera y'igisagara. Yongera ko y'uko igitigiri c'abapfuye n'abakomeretse kitazwi kandi ko abajejwe ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi bari aho vyabereye. Nk'uko vyagenze kuri Kyiv, ibibombe kandi vyumvikanye mu gisagara ca Lyiv kiri mu burengero bwa Ukraine muri aka gatondo. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri app ya Telegram, buramatari Maksym Kozytskyi yavuze ko habaye igitero c'indege hagati y'isaha cumi n'imwe n'iminoa 46 (05:46) n'isaha imwe n'iminota ibiri (07:02 ) mu masaha y'aho muri ico gihugu. Avuga ko abajejwe gucungera ikirere ba Ukraine bariko barakora, ariko akaba atatomoye ku hatewe iyo mabombe, hamwe n'abakomeretse canke bakahasiga ubuzima.

column2: EU: Indangamuntu ya Covid-19 yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi?
column3: Indangamuntu nshasha ya Covid mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya (EU), Digital Covid Certificate/Certificat COVID numérique - "indangamuntu" y'iri shirahamwe yerekana ko waronse urucanco - iriko iratanguzwa hose mu bihugu 27 vy'iri shirahamwe. Ni nde ayifitiye uburenganzira, yoba isigura iki ku ngenzi? Ni uburyo bw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bwerekana ko abanyagihugu: Ibihugu vyose 27 vy'iri shirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya - co kimwe no mu bihugu vy'Ubuswisi, Iceland/Islande, Norvège na  Liechtenstein - birayifise kandi birayemera. Itangwa ku buntu - kandi abanyagihugu ba EU, co kimwe n'abanyamahanga baba muri ibi bihugu vya EU mu mategeko (bakaba bafise uburenganzira bwo gutembera mu bindi bihugu vyo muri iri shirahamwe) bashobora kuyivoma (download) bakayigumana kuri ngendanwa zabo, canke barakonswa urukaratasi rw'ikopi. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari vyamaze gutangura kuyikoresha ku gushaka kwavyo - ariko rero ku wa 01 z'uku kw'indwi niho yatanguzwa icese, mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu.
