Izoba ifise code QR hamwe n'urupfunguruzo nyabwonko (digital signature key/clé de signature numérique) umuntu yisangije, ibi bikazoshoboza umuntu kwinjira mu bubiko yisangije burimwo amakuru yose ajanye n'incanco yaronse - nk'akarorero ibitaro, ikigo canke urwego rwamuhaye uru rucanco. Amakuru y'umuntu yisangije azoguma kuri iyi ndangamuntu yiwe, ntazobikwa canke ngo agumanwe, nk'akarorero ku kibuga c'indege, mu gihe bazoba bahejeje guhinyuza ko ari ay'ukuri. Abantu barizeye ko iyi ndangamuntu izokworohereza ingenzi gutembera mu bihugu vy'ishiramahwe EU. Ntabwo ari igitabo c'inzira - ingenzi izotegerezwa kuba igifise canke urundi rukaratasi urwo ari rwo rwose rwerekana ibiyiranga. Gusa, umuntu uwo ari we wese azoba afise iyi ndangamuntu, mu bisanzwe azoba arekuriwe kwinjira mu gihugu ico ari co cose atarinze gupimwa canke kubanza gutaramurwa mu kiringo kanaka. Si co kimwe - ariko zompi zerekana amakuru amwe kandi zifise intumbero imwe yo kwerekana ingene umuntu ahagaze ku bijanye na Covid. Ishirahamwe EU ntiriremeza Covid Pass, ariko ibihugu ku gatwe kavyo, nk'akarorero Ubugiriki na Espagne, biramaze kuyemera. EU ivuga ko iriko irakora uko ishoboye kwose kugira ngo iyi ndangamuntu ise n'izindi z'ibihugu bitari muri EU. Mu bisanzwe nta ngorane ihari. Hari incanco zine zose zemewe mu Bwongereza no mu bihugu vyo muri EU  - gusa hari zitatu mu zemewe mu Bwongereza rimwe na rimwe zizwi ku mazina atandukanye, ariko ni zimwe. Muri EU: Ariko, Oxford-AstraZeneca (AZ) yahinguwe n'ikigo Serum Institute co mu Buhindi (SII) ifise irindi zina rigira gatatu - Covishield. N'aho ari co kimwe n'iyo yahinguriwe i Bulaya, ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ntiriyemera. None hari ingorane kubona Covishield itemewe ku mugabane wa Bulaya? Covishield irakoreshwa cane mu bihugu bikenye biciye muri wa mugambi mpuzamakungu w'incanco uzwi nka Covax, ubu hakaba hari impungenge ko iyi ndangamuntu ya Bulaya ishobora kutemera ingenzi ziva muri ivyo bihugu. Ikigo ca Bulaya kijejwe imiti, European Medicines Agency/Agence européenne des médicaments (EMA) ntigitegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ikigo c'Ubuhindi gihingura Oxford-AstraZeneca, kubera ata ncanco ziva muri ico gihugu zinjira muri EU. Ariko ikigo Serum Institute kivugwa ko coba kibanza gusaba uruhusha muri EU kugira ngo gishobore guhingura Covishield. Ikigo AstraZeneca kandi kivuga ko kiriko kirakorana na EMA kugira ngo barabe ko "Covishield nayo yokwemerwa kuja muri izi ndangamuntu z'incanco". Gusa EMA ivuga ko gushika ubu itarigera ironka igisabo ico ari co cose kirondera ko uru rucanco rwemerwa. N'ubwo uru rucanco rutemewe gukoreshwa mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS ryaremeje ko rushobora gukoreshwa mu buryo bwihutirwa - kandi n'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya rivuga ko ibihugu vyaryo ku giti cavyo bishobora kwemerera ingenzi kwinjira mu gihe bahawe urucanco rwa Covishield. Hanyuma kandi, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari bisanzwe vyemera izindi ncanco - nk'akarorero Ubugiriki buremera urucanco rw'Ubushinwa Sinovac, urucanco rw'Uburusiya Sputnik V hamwe n'izindi zitari nke. Urwego rukuru rushinzwe amagara y'abantu muri Afrika ruranegura cane ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya yo gukura ku rutonde ingenzi zahawe incanco za AstraZeneca zakorewe mu Buhindi mu mugambi w'iyi ndangamuntu ya Covid. Umukuru w'ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara Centres for Disease Control and Prevention, John Nkengasong, avuga ko ingingo y'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya itisunze ubuhinga n'amakuru yerekana ingene incanco zakorewe mu Buhindi zihagaze, kandi ata cerekana ko zidakora neza uzigereranije n'iza Bulaya.

column2: Umugambi wa UK wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda uteye kubiri 'na kamere y'Imana' - Welby
column3: Umukuru w'ishengero ry'Ubwongereza (Church of England), Justin Welby, kuri uyu wa Mungu yaneguye umugambi wa Reta y'Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda abarondera ubuhungiro. Uyu Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury avuga ko uwu mugambi "uteye kubiri na kamere y'Imana". Mu nyigisho yiwe ya Pasika, Justin Welby yavuze ko igihe c'izuka rya Yesu Kristu/Yesu Kristo atari ico "kuremeka inshingano zacu abandi". Reta ivuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka kugira bakingire ubuzima bw'abantu ntibagurishwe.l Muri uwu mugambi w'imiriyoni 120 z'amapadundi (hafi imiriyoni 157 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika)  - watangajwe muri ino ndwi - abantu bafatwa ko binjiye mu Bwongereza bidaciye mu mategeko bazotwarwa muri iki gihugu c'Urwanda, ari ho bazokwemererwa gusabira uburenganzira bwo kuja kuba muri ico gihugu. Iyi ngingo iriyamirizwa bikomeye, aho amashirahamwe atabara abatishoboye arenga 160 ariko asaba abashikiranganji guhagarika ico bita poritike "y'ubugome". Eka n'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Bwongereza na bamwe mu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera (Conservatives) baranegura iyi ngingo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku Rusengero rukuru rwa Canterbury kuri uno musi wa Mungu wa Pasika, Musenyeri Welby yavuze ko  hari "ibibazo bikomeye bitewe n'irungikwa ry'abasaba ubuhungiro mu mahanga". Yongerako ati: "Ibisigaye ni ivya poritike n'abanyaporitike. Ica ngenderwako n'uko vyoba ari vyiza mu maso y'Imana. Ariko siko bimeze. " ...kandi ntibihuye n'inshingano zacu nk'igihugu kigendera ku ndangagaciro k'aba-Kristu: kuko kuremeka abandi inshingano zacu, naho hoba ari ku gihugu kirondera ineza nk'Urwanda, ni igihushane ca kamere k'Imana, kuko yo nyene ubwayo yaremeye kwiremeka ibitunanira". Ubushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati yashigikiye uwu mugambi bufatiye ku majambo yo kunegura yavuzwe n'uyu musenyeri, bukavuga ko Ubwongereza "bwishimira kahise kabwo" ko gufasha abo bose babikeneye, kandi ko n'imigambi yo guha ubuhungiro ababukeneye wafashije ibihumbi amajana n'amajana kuronka "inzira nziza kandi zemewe n'amategeko zo kwubaka kazoza kabo". Umuvugizi w'ubwo bushikiranganji avuga ati: "Hagati aho, isi irahanzwe n'ikibazo c'abimukira ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho rero hakenewe impinduka kugira ngo abantu babi bashora abantu bareke gushira ubuzima bw'abantu mu kaga hanyuma n'ikibazo c'abarondera ubuhungiro kw'isi cananiraye gitorerwe umuti". Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko Urwanda "rutekanye" kandi ko ruzokwiga abasaba ubuhungiro hisunzwe amategeko mpuzamakungu akingira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Amasendika y'abakozi ba reta avuga ko iyi ngingo ari "iy'ubunyamaswa" ariko ko abategetsi bazotegerezwa kuyishira mu ngiro canke naho bakagenda. Ku wa kane, Ubwongereza n'Urwanda vyashize ahabona amasezerano mashasha azotuma bamwe mu barondera ubuhungiro bazoronswa gusa itike y'indege yo kugenda bakaja muri ico gihugu. column2: Tokyo Olympics: 'Amafaranga, amazu, inka' - Ingene ibihugu bimwe bishimira abatahukanye imidari
column3: Hari ibituma vyinshi umukinyi arondera gutsindira umudari mu nkino za Olympics... iteka, kwiyumva ko waranguye ikintu gikomeye, no kumenyekana. Ariko wari uzi ko ibihugu vyinshi bitanga utundi dushimwe ku bakinyi bavyo, harimwo amafaranga abona, amazu mbere n'inka? Mu gihe Comite International Olympique (CIO/IOC) ata mafaranga itanga ku babaye batatu bambere bakurira ingazi z'iteka (podium), ibihugu bitari bike biragerageza kuguma vyakije akariro ko guhiganwa mu gutanga udushimwe. Raba bimwe mu vyo abakinyi bo mu nkino za Olympics za Tokyo 2020 bashobora kuronka, uretse gutahana inzahabu. Umugore w'umunya-Philippines aterura ibiremereye cane Hidilyn Diaz yatumye igihugu cose kimerereza ku wa 26 ukwezi kw'indwi aho yatwara umudari wa mbere wa Olympic w'inzahabu w'ico gihugu kuva kibaho. Yarushije abandi mu mugwi w'abagore  batarenza ibiro 55 aca aba intwari  mu gihugu. Ariko ivyo Diaz yashitseko  vyaciye bihindura ubuzima bwiwe birenze urwego rw'inkino. Uretse kuronka agashimwe k'amafaranga abona arenga ibihumbi $600.000 (hafi miriyaridi 1,2 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) - arimwo ayatanzwe n'umugwi wa Philippines ujejwe inkino hamwe n'umukuru w'ico gihugu Rodrigo Dutertes ubwiwe- yahawe kandi inzu zibiri nshasha. Imwe muri izo ni appartement nziza cane yahawe n'umunya-Philippines akomoka mu Bushinwa afise itunga riharurwa muri za miriyaridi z'ama dorari,  Andrew Lim Tam. Si ikintu gito na gato ku mukinyi w'umugore asanzwe ahembwa $500 kw'ipete rya sergeant mu ngabo zo mu kirere za Philippines. Uvyemere canke ureke, uwo mudari yawutsindiye kandi ata hantu ho kwitegurira inkino za Olympics (gym) yari afise, ahubwo yiterateranije wenyene ivyo guterura aho we na bagenziwe bakinana bamariye amezi 18  baheze muri Malaysia mu gihe c'ikiza ca Covid-19. Udushimwe tw'amafaranga turatandukanye bivanye n'igihugu kimwe kimwe. ''Ibihugu bikukumba imidari myinshi", aho abakinyi bakoresha uburyo bwinshi mu kwitegura no mu bikoresho, akenshi nta kinini bikunda gutanga, kurusha ivyo usanga iteka rya Olympic ari ririni gusumba, aho rifatwa nk'ubutwari. Malaysia, igihugu kimaze gutwara imidari 11 yonyene mu nkino za Olympics 13, cemeye gutanga $241.000 ku wuzotahana umudari w'inzahabu mu nkino za Tokyo, ariko uwo n'ubu akaba akirindiriwe (agashimwe ku mudari w'ifeza ni $150.000 na $24.000 ku wa bronze). Kuva itari 2 ukwezi kw'umunani, Malaysia yari imaze kuronka umudari umwe gusa muri izo nkino: uwa bronze muri badminton y'abagabo bakina ari babiri babiri. Ku rundi ruhande, Australia, igeze ku midari irenga 500 kuva ku wa 29 ukwezi kw'indwi, yemeye gutanga ayari munsi  ya 10%  y'agaciro k'iyo midari kuri buri wese abaye muri batatu baronka imidari - aho muri izo nkino za Tokyo, Australia imaze kuronka imidari 30. Ubushinwa n'Uburusiya nivyo bihugu bifise ico vyisangije ubigereranije n'ibindi vya rutura mu kwegeranya imidari nyinshi. Abakinyi bavyo batahanye imidari ya Olympic uretse guhabwa amafaranga abona, bazohabwa n'utundi dushimwe tw'igihugu n'utwaho basanzwe baba. Ku vyerekeye Uburusiya, udushimwe turimwo imodoka nshasha n'amazu (appartements). Tumwe mu dushimwe ariko ntitumenyerewe. Abanya-Afrika y'Epfo bahiganwa mu gusoza ubwato Sizwe Ndlovu, Matthew Brittain, John Smith na James Thompson batsinze ihiganwa mu nkino za Londres mu 2012, bahawe inka umwe umwe. Bahawe ivyo bitunngwa na Jan Scannel, umugwizatunga akaba n'uwuremesha ibiganiro vyo guteka kuri television cane cane mu vyerekeye kwotsa inyama (barbecue). Mu bihugu vyinshi umudari wa Olympic ushobora kuguhesha akazi. Canke ukongerwa umushahara. Umugore wo mu Buhindi ahiganwa mu guterura ibiro vyinshi Mirabai Chanu yarahawe agashimwe ka $350.000 ku mudari w'ifeza yaronkeye Tokyo , ariko na cane cane icatanjgaje, yaciye yemererwa imbere y'abantu kuduzwa ipete mu kazi n'umukoreshab wiwe, kompanyi y'indarayi (inzira za gariyamoshi) y'Ubuhindi. Muri Korea y'Epfo, abatahanye imidari barahabwa amafaranga, ariko kamwe mu bushimwe buruta ubundi ku bagabo batahanye imidari, ni uguhabwa uruhusha rwo kutitaba ibikorwa vya gisirikare bitegerezwa kuri buri wese ku kiringo c'amezi 18. I Tokyo, ako gashimwe kari ako kwandura ku bakinyi babiri b'ico gihugu bitavye amahigwnwa ya golf , Sungjae Im na Si Woo Kim - yamara, nta n'umwe muri bo yatahanye umudari. Ivyo guha udushimwe abatahanye imidari ya Okympic si bishasha kuko vyatanguye mu myaka ya 1980. Ariko utwo dushirukabute twakomeje kugenda tuba tunini kuva ico gihe. Uwutabizi yobibaza umwozi wo muri Singapore Joseph Schooling:  amaze gutsinda rurangiranwa w'umunyamerika Michael Phelps ku mudari w'inzahabu ku metero 100 boga nk'abashaka kuguruka, yaciye ahabwa agashimwe ka $750.000 na reta yiwe. Ariko kuri benshi, bene utwo dushimwe tuza kubatezurira kuko benshi bahiganwa mu nkino ata benshi bazitaho mu binyamakuru, n'ababafata mu mugongo uretse mu rwego rwa Olympic ugasanga kubaronka ntivyoroshe. Abitaba amahiganwa ya Olympics muri Brezil, nk'akarorero, ahanini bakoresha uburyo buke reta ibaha, muri abo hakaba harimwo uwuhiganwa muri gym Rebeca Andrade, yashwangamuye isi mu gutsindira imidari ibiri mu mahiganwa y'abagore. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, Global Athlete, ikigo gikora ubushakashatsi cabajije abakinyi 500 bakomeye mu bitaba inkino za Olympic bo mu bihugu 48 bitandukanye, kibabaza ibijanye n'amafaranga. Hafi 60 kw'ijana bakibwiye ko ''bibona nk'abatagira amaragamo" mu bijanye n'amafaranga. Abakinyi mu bihugu vyinshi, harimwo n'ibitahana imidari myinshi nka Amerika, bakoresheje  inzira zo guterereza abantu benshi mugabo batanga duke duke cane (crowdfunding) kugira baronke uburyo  bwo kwitegurira inkino za Tokyo. Nka  Bethany Shriever, umwongerezakazi  aja mu mahiganwa yo gutwara ikinga  mu nziza zigoye BMX (mubona kw'ifoto aho haruguru) nibwo buryo yakoresheje kugira ashike ku ndoto ziwe za Olympic inyuma y'aho mu 2017 hagabanuriwe amafaranga yo gushigikira abagore bakora bene ayo mahiganwa. Ikiza ca Covid-19 catumye ibintu bigora gusumba, inyuma y'aho hahagarikiwe hayuma hagafutwa amahiganwa aho abakinyi bahabwa amafaranga yo  guhagarara mu kibanza ca batatu ba mbere  hamwe n'udushimwe tw'amafaranga. Iciza n'uko ibi ari ibintu benshi mu bakinyi bavuzwe aho harugu, bitakibaraje ishinga, kubera udushimwe dushasha baronse, harimwo uwuterurira ibiro vyinshi Hidilyn Diaz, yavuze mu kiganiro aheje gutsinda  ati: "N'aho hari ikiza, turi ngaha kandi dutahanye umudari" akongerako ati "nta na kimwe kidashoboka".

column2: Covid-19: 83% vy'abanye-Afrika ntibararonswa urukingo rwa mbere - OMS
column3: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, avuga ko abanye-Afrika 83% batararonswa urukingo rwa mbere rwa Covid-19. Ivyo yabishikirije mu buryo bw'iyakure mu nama yabereye ku murwa mukuru wa Nigeria Abuja. Hari ku munsi hibukwa umwaka uheze Afrika ironkejwe inkingo za mbere za Covid muri wa mugambi wa Covax. Covax ni umugambi mpuzamakungu ugamije kuronsa bose ku buryo bungana inkingo za Covid. Dr Tedros yavuze ko uwo mugambi wadindijwe cane n'ivyo yise "ukwigungirako urukingo ku rwego rw'ibihugu". Ngo vyatewe kandi n'amashirahamwe ahingura imiti, yashira imbere ibihugu vyifise mu gutanga izo nkingo.

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.
